original: de lta yin na mthong bzhin pa ma yin pa'i byed pa po gzhan nyid yin na /ğŸ”½'ji ba'i 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir zhes bye brag can du smras par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin na mthong bzhin pa ma yin pa'i byed pa po gzhan nyid yin na / 'ji ba'i 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir zhes bye brag can du smras par 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were so, then the potter would be a different person from the one who is actually seen.ğŸ”½If the potter is a different person from the one who is actually seen, then the potter would be a different person from the one who is actually seen.

original: bye brag dang 'khrul ba'i yul phyogs su byed pa dag la bye brag ci yang med do ;
analyzed: bye brag dang 'khrul ba'i yul phyogs su byed pa dag la bye brag ci yang med do ;
translated: There is no difference at all between the two, the one who makes a distinction and the one who is mistaken.

original: / bum pa la sogs pa dang sa gzhi la sogs pa bum pa byed pa'i byed pa po nyid ldog pa la yang bye brag can gyi 'ji ba'i 'gyur ba nyid mi ldog pa'i phyir 'khrul pa ma yin nam /

translated: But isnâ€™t it a mistake to say that the potter is not the maker of the pot, but the clay is?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not a mistake.

original: grog mkhar nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyis de nyid phyogs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grog mkhar nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyis de nyid phyogs yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: chu dang me la sogs pa rnams kyang phyogs yin na ni khyad par byed pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: chu dang me la sogs pa rnams kyang phyogs yin na ni khyad par byed pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But if water, fire, etc., are also the basis of the distinction, then they are not the maker of the distinction.

original: ma yin te sa 'jim tsam phyogs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te sa 'jim tsam phyogs yin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: bye brag can nyid kyis 'khrul pa med pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The following verse is stated to show that there is no mistake in the distinction.

original: grog mkhar rdza mkhan gyis byas pa la ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: grog mkhar rdza mkhan gyis byas pa la ni zhes bya ba ste /

analyzed: grog mkhar gyi nye bar mtshon pas sa gzhi la sogs pa nyid phyogs su byed par yang bstan pa ni /

original: 'bras bu de la ma mthong zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu de la ma mthong zhes bya ba'o //

original: bye brag gi 'khrul pa spangs pa yin par yang brtag par dka'o zhe na /
analyzed: bye brag gi 'khrul pa spangs pa yin par yang brtag par dka'o zhe na /

analyzed: khyed kyi yang phyogs su byed pa yin pas 'khrul pa'i yul spangs dka' bar mtshungs pa yin par bstan pa ni /

original: de dbang phyug la yang med dam ci zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dbang phyug la yang med dam ci zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: byed pa po'i rjes su 'jug pa'i ngo bo'i rgyu ni grog mkhar la sogs pa bzhin du sa gzhi la sogs pa la yang ma grub pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The cause of the nature that follows the agent is not established in the ground, etc., just as in the case of the anthill, etc.

original: gal te de lta yin na /
analyzed: gal te de lta yin na /
translated: If that is the case,

analyzed: khyed kyi 'di ches zhib tu rtogs pa yin te zhes bya ba'o //

original: gzhan yang the tshom za ba'i ma grub pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang the tshom za ba'i ma grub pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Moreover, it is taught that it is not unestablished because of doubt:

original: sa 'dzin nyer mkho med pas dbyibs //
analyzed: sa 'dzin nyer mkho med pas dbyibs //
translated: The shape of the earth is not established because it is not necessary.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: This is taught by the words â€œshapeâ€ and so on.

original: bum pa la sogs pa bzhin du sa gzhi la sogs pa'i ngo bo yang blo dang ldan pa'i 'khrul pa kho na ma min nam /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa bzhin du sa gzhi la sogs pa'i ngo bo yang blo dang ldan pa'i 'khrul pa kho na ma min nam /
translated: Is the nature of the earth and so on like a pot and so on, or is it only the error of the intelligent?

analyzed: de ltar rab tu grags pa'i phyir drang srong ngan spong la sogs pa rnams kyis /
translated: In that way, because it is well known, the sages such as Kapila taught:

original: kun gyi ston pa khyad par can //
analyzed: kun gyi ston pa khyad par can //

analyzed: phra ba las kyang phra ba ni //
translated: is subtler than the subtle.

original: 'od gsal rmi lam blo yi yul //
analyzed: 'od gsal rmi lam blo yi yul //
translated: The object of the mind of clear light

original: rigs pa'i mthar thug skyes mchog ste //
analyzed: rigs pa'i mthar thug skyes mchog ste //
translated: is the supreme being who is the ultimate reasoning.

original: 'di ni 'byung ba thams cad la //
analyzed: 'di ni 'byung ba thams cad la //

original: mtshungs par mngon khyab lus @154b rnams kyi //
analyzed: mtshungs par mngon khyab lus @154b rnams kyi //

original: skye dang cher skyes 'jig rnams kyis //
analyzed: skye dang cher skyes 'jig rnams kyis //
translated: are born, born again, and destroyed.

original: rtag tu 'khor lo bzhin 'khor byed //
analyzed: rtag tu 'khor lo bzhin 'khor byed //

original: ces gang bstan pa'i 'jig rten yang de ltar brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: ces gang bstan pa'i 'jig rten yang de ltar brjod pa yin te /
translated: The world that is taught is also described in that way.

original: gling gzhan nas sam /
analyzed: gling gzhan nas sam /
translated: From another continent,

original: rgya mtsho'i nang nas sam /
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i nang nas sam /
translated: Or, it is like the ocean,ğŸ”½or like the ends of the directions.

original: phyogs kyi mtha' gnas glo bur du sgrub par byed cing mngon par 'dod pa la mngon par phyogs par byed pas 'jug par byed pas sgrub par byed pa nyid ni rig byed kyis byed pa yin pa'i phyir byed pa ma mthong ba la yang /
analyzed: phyogs kyi mtha' gnas glo bur du sgrub par byed cing mngon par 'dod pa la mngon par phyogs par byed pas 'jug par byed pas sgrub par byed pa nyid ni rig byed kyis byed pa yin pa'i phyir byed pa ma mthong ba la yang /
translated: Since it is engaged in the sudden accomplishment of the desired object, it is engaged in the accomplishment of the object. Since it is engaged in the accomplishment of the object, it is the agent. Since it is the agent, it is seen.

original: byas pa'i blo 'di la yang ma nyams pa yin no //
analyzed: byas pa'i blo 'di la yang ma nyams pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the cognition of the effect is not impaired.

analyzed: de'i phyir bdag cag la sogs pa dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i blo can ni /

analyzed: nye bar dmigs pa'i ngo bo'i bye brag mthong ba'i me'i bye brag bzhin du 'jig rten gyis spang par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: is not to be abandoned by the world, like the particular cognition of fire that sees the particular of the observed entity.

original: dang po nyid kyi gnod pa'i blo bsal ba'i yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dang po nyid kyi gnod pa'i blo bsal ba'i yul yin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: dang po'i dngul gyi blo la yang bye brag mthong ba las nya phyis kyi blos gnod par byed pa yin la /

original: 'di la ni bum pa la sogs pa dang sa gzhi la sogs pa'i bye brag gnod par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di la ni bum pa la sogs pa dang sa gzhi la sogs pa'i bye brag gnod par byed pa ma yin te /

analyzed: gnyi ga la yang bsgrub bya grub pa la gnod pa med pa'i phyir dang / rjes su dpag pa /

original: gzhan yang 'di la gnod par byed pa ma yin te /

analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad la grags pas gnod pa'i phyir ri bong can zla ba ma yin zhes bya ba lta bu'o snyam du sems pa ni /

original: skyon 'di 'bras mtshungs ma yin nam //
analyzed: skyon 'di 'bras mtshungs ma yin nam //
translated: Isn't this fault similar to the result?

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is said.

original: lan du 'bras la zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: lan du 'bras la zhes bya ba smos te /

original: yang gtan tshigs 'di ci las shes she na /
analyzed: yang gtan tshigs 'di ci las shes she na /

analyzed: bsgrub byas rjes 'gro phyir zhes bya ba ste /

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i bya brag nges par byed pa tsam gyis sa la sogs pa'i lhan cig byed pas 'bras bu'i nges pa'i ngo bo'i rjes su 'gro ba las /

original: 'brel pa can ni tha dad phyir te bum pa dang sa gzhi la sogs pa tha dad pa'i phyir tha dad par nye bar bkod pa ni 'bras bu mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa can ni tha dad phyir te bum pa dang sa gzhi la sogs pa tha dad pa'i phyir tha dad par nye bar bkod pa ni 'bras bu mtshungs pa'o //
translated: The similar effect is the arrangement of the different, because the different pot, ground, etc. are different.

original: dper na 'bras bu nyid de sgra bsgrub par bya ba la btsal ba'i 'bras bu sgrub byed ni spyis te bskyed pa dang mngon par gsal ba thun mong ba'i ngo bos kyang ngo //
analyzed: dper na 'bras bu nyid de sgra bsgrub par bya ba la btsal ba'i 'bras bu sgrub byed ni spyis te bskyed pa dang mngon par gsal ba thun mong ba'i ngo bos kyang ngo //
translated: For example, the effect itself is the proof of sound, because the effect of the sought-after is established by the universal, also by the common nature of production and manifestation.

original: gtan tshigs la zhes pa ni yul gyi bdun pa ste /ğŸ”½tha dad @155a * //
analyzed: gtan tshigs la zhes pa ni yul gyi bdun pa ste / tha dad @155a * //
translated: The in the reason is the seventh case, the objective case.

original: par brjod ba'i skyon gyi yul can la ltos nas so //
analyzed: par brjod ba'i skyon gyi yul can la ltos nas so //
translated: The fault of expressing difference is in relation to the subject.

original: de lta yin na yang sgrub byed yin par ci las shes /
analyzed: de lta yin na yang sgrub byed yin par ci las shes /
translated: Even though that is so, how is it known that it is the proof?

original: rtag pa la ni shin tu rag las par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir /

original: mngon par gsal ba yin par mi rigs zhes bya ba'i phyogs la bsgrub byas zhes bya ba 'bras bu nyid la sogs pas de tsam gyis rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir zhes bya ba rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir yin te /

translated: The meaning of the statement â€œit is not tenable that it is clearly manifestâ€ is that the probandum is the mere object of expression, because the mere object of expression is pervaded by being a result and so on.

original: gzhan du na ma nges pa yin no //ğŸ”½bskyed pa dang mngon par gsal bar rjod byed nyid kyis 'bras bu ma yin pa thun mong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i dgongs pas spyis kyang sgrub par byed pa la zhes bya ba bye brag yin no zhes dpe la gnas pa nyid kyis gsal bar byed pağŸ”½yin gyi / sems pa can gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub byed la 'bras bu dang mtshungs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan du na ma nges pa yin no // bskyed pa dang mngon par gsal bar rjod byed nyid kyis 'bras bu ma yin pa thun mong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i dgongs pas spyis kyang sgrub par byed pa la zhes bya ba bye brag yin no zhes dpe la gnas pa nyid kyis gsal bar byed pa yin gyi / sems pa can gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub byed la 'bras bu dang mtshungs pa ma yin te /
translated: Otherwise, it would be indefinite.ğŸ”½The meaning is that because the mere object of expression is common to both results and nonresults, the mere object of expression is a proof by the power of the fact.ğŸ”½The statement â€œit is not the same as a proof by the power of the factâ€ is a specific example of the general statement â€œthe mere object of expression is a proof by the power of the fact.â€

original: nus pa la sogs pa dang thun mong ba'i ngo bo nyid ni sems can phul du byung ba'i rjes su byed pa nyid kyis de'i rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa la sogs pa dang thun mong ba'i ngo bo nyid ni sems can phul du byung ba'i rjes su byed pa nyid kyis de'i rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not the same as a proof by the power of the fact that is blessed by a sentient being, because the nature that is common to potency and so on is pervaded by being a result that is a subsequent state of a sentient being.

original: sa gzhi la sogs pa'i ngo bo ni de dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa nyid kyis rjes su 'gro ba ma yin no //ğŸ”½'jig rten du ni bdag gis sngon byas pa'i las so zhes smra ba ni /

analyzed: las kho na la 'byin byed dang / dbang phyug ces smra ba yin no //

original: lung yang don 'di la rigs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: lung yang don 'di la rigs pa yin gyi /
translated: The scriptures are also consistent with this interpretation.

original: gzhan la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan la ni ma yin te /

analyzed: slu ba yin pa'i phyir ro // 'dis ni ji ltar bum pa la sogs pa sems pa can yod kyang las sgrub pa yin pa de bzhin du /

analyzed: sa gzhi la sogs pa la las yod kyang byin gyis rlob pa po sems pa can cis sgrub par mi byed ces pa bsal ba yin te /

analyzed: go'i sgra spyi las tshigs la sogs pa rnams kyis sogs pa'i sgra ni gsal bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir /

analyzed: rva la sogs pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o //

analyzed: nye bar gnas par byed pa ma yin par bstan pa ni / brjod par 'dod pa'i gzhan dbang phyir //

original: don mthong @161a * //
analyzed: don mthong @161a * //

original: ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: ba'i phyir ro zhe na /

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /

original: don gyi rang gi ngo bo ma mthong ba yin te /
analyzed: don gyi rang gi ngo bo ma mthong ba yin te /

original: dmigs bya nyid tsam ni rgyu nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: dmigs bya nyid tsam ni rgyu nyid ma yin te /

original: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /

analyzed: yul gzhan la sogs pa la yang des mthong ba ma yin no //

original: gzhan gyis mthong ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan gyis mthong ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not seen by another cognition,

original: de lta yin na de'i yul yin gyi gzhan gyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir yul med par 'gyur ba des na yang de nyid dpag bya yin na ji ltar dbang po dang mi 'phrad pa yin /
analyzed: de lta yin na de'i yul yin gyi gzhan gyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir yul med par 'gyur ba des na yang de nyid dpag bya yin na ji ltar dbang po dang mi 'phrad pa yin /
translated: then, since it is the object of that cognition and not the object of another, it would not be nonexistent. But if it is to be inferred, how can it not be in contact with a sense faculty?

original: rnam pa gang gis dpog pa de de la med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa gang gis dpog pa de de la med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that the aspect by which it is inferred does not exist in that object,

original: gang du snang ba de na med pa yin na gzhan na yang de bzhin du med pa yin te /
analyzed: gang du snang ba de na med pa yin na gzhan na yang de bzhin du med pa yin te /
translated: then if it does not exist where it appears, it does not exist elsewhere either,

original: mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not appear.

original: med pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: med pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not nonexistent,

original: snang ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snang ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not contradictory to appearance.

original: des na shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo kho na yin no //
analyzed: des na shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo kho na yin no //
translated: Therefore it is the nature of cognition itself.

original: de'i phyir dmigs bya ma yin pa nyid dam /
analyzed: de'i phyir dmigs bya ma yin pa nyid dam /
translated: Therefore, it is not the object of perception,

original: rgyu nyid kyi phyir snang bas bye brag med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyu nyid kyi phyir snang bas bye brag med pa'i phyir /
translated: or it is the cause of perception, because it is not distinguished by the light.

original: bdag nyid kho na shes pa rnams kyi snang ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid kho na shes pa rnams kyi snang ba kho na yin no //
translated: Therefore, the light is only the perception of the self.

original: de yang phrad bya dang 'brel ba'i phyir gnod pa med pa yin la /
analyzed: de yang phrad bya dang 'brel ba'i phyir gnod pa med pa yin la /
translated: And that is not invalidated because it is related to the object of contact.

original: de med na gnod pa med pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid dam cig shos rnams su rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de med na gnod pa med pa'i phyir tshad ma nyid dam cig shos rnams su rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: And when that is absent, it is not invalidated, so it is established as valid knowledge or the other.

original: de ltar ni sgra rnams ni tshad ma nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar ni sgra rnams ni tshad ma nyid ma yin te /
translated: Sound is not valid knowledge,

original: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not related.

original: de bzhin du sgra gcig nyid la yang don gcig pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra gcig nyid la yang don gcig pa ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, even a single sound does not have a single meaning,

original: tha dad par snang ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan nas /ğŸ”½da ni rgol ba dang / phyir rgol bdag las gang yang rung ba dang khas len pa dang 'gal @161b ba'i phyir yang /
analyzed: tha dad par snang ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan nas / da ni rgol ba dang / phyir rgol bdag las gang yang rung ba dang khas len pa dang 'gal @161b ba'i phyir yang /
translated: because it contradicts the appearance of difference.

original: don mi 'grub pa ni sgrub byed ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: don mi 'grub pa ni sgrub byed ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Now, in order to show that a proof is not established when there is contradiction with an assertion by either the proponent or the opponent,ğŸ”½he says,

original: sems pa med pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs las dang / sems pa can dang shun pa bshus na 'chi ba'i phyir zhes dpyad pa yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: sems pa med pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs las dang / sems pa can dang shun pa bshus na 'chi ba'i phyir zhes dpyad pa yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The argument that sound is impermanent because it is a product, and the analysis of the argument that a tree is sentient because it dies when the bark is completely removed, are similar.

original: blo ni sems pa can ma yin te /
analyzed: blo ni sems pa can ma yin te /
translated: The cognition is not sentient,

original: mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i mngon par grub pa tsam ni rgol ba grangs can la mi rtag pa nyid kyi 'jig pa'i ngo bo ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i mngon par grub pa tsam ni rgol ba grangs can la mi rtag pa nyid kyi 'jig pa'i ngo bo ma grub pa yin no //
translated: because it is impermanent. The mere establishment of the cognition is not established for the SÄá¹ƒkhya opponent.

original: shing rnams ni sems pa can yin te /
analyzed: shing rnams ni sems pa can yin te /
translated: The trees are sentient,

original: shun pa thams cad bshus na 'chi ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ngo tsha med pa'i sbyor ba las phyir rgol ba sangs rgyas pa'i rnam shes la sogs pa 'gag pa 'chi ba'i dngos po ni ma grub pa yin la /
analyzed: shun pa thams cad bshus na 'chi ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ngo tsha med pa'i sbyor ba las phyir rgol ba sangs rgyas pa'i rnam shes la sogs pa 'gag pa 'chi ba'i dngos po ni ma grub pa yin la /
translated: because they die when the bark is completely removed. The opponent, the Buddhist, does not establish the entity of death as the cessation of consciousness, etc.

original: sgra ni gcig pu gnyi ga la grub pa yin yang sgrub byed dam sgrub byed du 'dogs par byed pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra ni gcig pu gnyi ga la grub pa yin yang sgrub byed dam sgrub byed du 'dogs par byed pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Sound is established for both parties as being singular, but it is not designated as the proof or the probandum.

original: gal te de lta yin na dbyibs sam /
analyzed: gal te de lta yin na dbyibs sam /
translated: If that is so, then shape

analyzed: bskyed pa bum pa la sogs pa dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa ni sa gzhi la sogs pa sems pa can du sgrub par byed pa ma yin la /

original: zhig pa nyid la yang sgrub par byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhig pa nyid la yang sgrub par byed par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: bskyed pa la sogs pa'i sgra 'am rtogs pa yang gcig pa'i phyir /

original: gcig nyid kho na yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gcig nyid kho na yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they are the same, they are not contradictory.

original: gnyis su med pas gnod pa ma yin na //
analyzed: gnyis su med pas gnod pa ma yin na //
translated: Since they are not contradictory, there is no fault.

original: de 'di ni sems pa can du sgrub par byed pa la yang mtshungs pa yin na /
analyzed: de 'di ni sems pa can du sgrub par byed pa la yang mtshungs pa yin na /
translated: This is the same for the proof that the earth, etc. are sentient beings.

original: ji ltar de spong bar byed ces zer ba ni /
analyzed: ji ltar de spong bar byed ces zer ba ni /
translated: How can you avoid this fault?

original: gal te khyad par yongs su brtags pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te khyad par yongs su brtags pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you think that the reason is not established because it is a quality that is imagined,

analyzed: de bzhin du mi rtag pa nyid ni grangs can rgol ba las ma grub pa yin no //
translated: in the same way, non-eternality is not established for the SÄá¹ƒkhya opponent.

original: 'chi ba ni phyir rgol ba sangs rgyas pa la ma grub pa yin te /
analyzed: 'chi ba ni phyir rgol ba sangs rgyas pa la ma grub pa yin te /

original: de'i phyir yan gar ba la ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir yan gar ba la ma grub pa yin no //

original: sgrub byed kyi skyon yin na bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dang chos dang chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo dang / de'i bye brag gi rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i yang /
analyzed: sgrub byed kyi skyon yin na bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dang chos dang chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo dang / de'i bye brag gi rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i yang /

original: yan gar ba la ma grub pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yan gar ba la ma grub pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro //

original: sgrub byed kho na skyon can yin la //
analyzed: sgrub byed kho na skyon can yin la //
translated: Only the reason is faulty.

original: bsgrub bya la sogs pa ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: bsgrub bya la sogs pa ni mi rigs te /
translated: The probandum, etc. are not, because

original: rigs pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the reasoning is the same.

original: phyogs kyi chos nyid ma grub pa la ji lta ba kho na phyir rgol ba'i gtan tshigs mi 'thob la /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos nyid ma grub pa la ji lta ba kho na phyir rgol ba'i gtan tshigs mi 'thob la /
translated: Just as the property of the subject is not established, so too the opponent does not obtain the reason.

original: de bzhin du rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag la sgra'i chos can gyi yon tan gsum la sogs pa la sangs rgyas pa la sogs pa la ma grub @162a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag la sgra'i chos can gyi yon tan gsum la sogs pa la sangs rgyas pa la sogs pa la ma grub @162a * //
translated: Similarly, with regard to the forward and reverse pervasion, the property possessor of sound, the three qualities, etc. are not established for the Buddhist, etc.

analyzed: pa'i bye brag can gyi phyogs yin zhing gzhi ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs yin no //

analyzed: sangs rgyas pa mngon par 'dod pa'i chos can la ni /

analyzed: de bzhin du mi rtag pa nyid kyi 'jig pa nyid //

analyzed: gal te nges pa can brjod na // de phyir 'di las gnyen por 'gyur //
translated: If it is stated with certainty,ğŸ”½then it is the opposite of this.

original: khyad par du yang ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par du yang ma grub pa'o //
translated: It is also not established as a specific property.

original: nges pa can gyi rnam rtog kyang //
analyzed: nges pa can gyi rnam rtog kyang //
translated: The conceptual thought of certainty

original: ldog dang 'dzin pa dag tu ni //
analyzed: ldog dang 'dzin pa dag tu ni //
translated: In terms of the negation and the apprehension

original: gong du yang ni khas blangs pa//
analyzed: gong du yang ni khas blangs pa//
translated: Is accepted above.

original: grangs can rgyal dpog dag tu 'gal //
analyzed: grangs can rgyal dpog dag tu 'gal //
translated: It is contradictory in the SÄá¹ƒkhya and the BrÄhmaá¹‡a.

original: de ltar na gtan tshigs dang 'brel ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pas ma grub pa dang / ma nges pa la sogs pa'i skyon yin na /
analyzed: de ltar na gtan tshigs dang 'brel ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pas ma grub pa dang / ma nges pa la sogs pa'i skyon yin na /
translated: Thus, if the faults of nonestablishment and uncertainty, etc., are due to conceptual thoughts such as the relation between the reason and the predicate,

analyzed: tha snyad pa rnams kyi yul dra bi ra pa dang / 'phags pa dag bzhin du phan tshun mi mthun pa'i phyir /
translated: then, because the objects of the conventionalists are mutually incompatible, like the tÄ«rthikas and the Äryas,

analyzed: 'gro ba rnams tha snyad med par 'gyur ro //

original: de bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de bstan pa ni /

analyzed: rgol ba gzhan la ltos pas sam rnam par brtag pas zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: de nyid kyang go bzhin du rnam par 'grel ba ni / nam mkha'i yon tan sgra yi chos //

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The quality of space is the property of sound.

original: 'di la lan du /ğŸ”½dngos po'i ngo bor ma grub la //
analyzed: 'di la lan du / dngos po'i ngo bor ma grub la //

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is not established as the entity of a thing.

original: bsgrub bya gang gis nges pa'i ngo bo gang yin de ma grub pa la tshul 'di ni dpe dang dpe can dag tha dad pa'i rnam rtog gi ngo bo'i skyon yin no //

translated: The nature of things is not established in the object of analysis.ğŸ”½The nature of things is not established in the subject, the reason, or the example.ğŸ”½The nature of things is not established in the object of analysis.ğŸ”½The nature of things is not established in the subject, the reason, or the example.

original: de bzhin du byas pa nyid kyang dpe dang dpe can rnams kyi gsal ba rnams las mi gzhan pa'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du byas pa nyid kyang dpe dang dpe can rnams kyi gsal ba rnams las mi gzhan pa'am /
translated: The nature of things is not established in the object of analysis.ğŸ”½The nature of things is not established in the subject

original: sna tshogs pa gsal ba re res tha dad pa de rnams las gal te /ğŸ”½dpe la yod pa nye bar bzung nam grub pa yin te /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa gsal ba re res tha dad pa de rnams las gal te / dpe la yod pa nye bar bzung nam grub pa yin te /
