original: gal te dpe can la yod pa yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te dpe can la yod pa yin na ni /
translated: If it is the case that the probandum exists in the example,

original: thun mong ma yin pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa nyid yin no //
translated: then it is not uncommon.

original: bsgrub byas stong pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / phyogs kyis stong pa dang mthun phyogs la med pa'i phyir ma tshang ba'i sgrub byed yin pa dang / sna tshogs pa dang gsal ba so so la gcig nyid pa rnams ni /
analyzed: bsgrub byas stong pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / phyogs kyis stong pa dang mthun phyogs la med pa'i phyir ma tshang ba'i sgrub byed yin pa dang / sna tshogs pa dang gsal ba so so la gcig nyid pa rnams ni /
translated: It is an incomplete proof because it is not concomitant with the empty probandum, it is empty with respect to the position, and it does not exist in the similar position. The various manifestations are individually one.

original: sangs rgyas pa dang dpyod pa pa la sogs pa la ma @163a * //ğŸ”½grub pa yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas pa dang dpyod pa pa la sogs pa la ma @163a * // grub pa yin no //
translated: This is not established for the Buddhists, the MÄ«mÄá¹ƒsakas, and so on.

original: gzhan gsal ba so so ba'i gcig pa yang sangs rgyas pa dang / bye brag pa la sogs pa la ma grub ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gsal ba so so ba'i gcig pa yang sangs rgyas pa dang / bye brag pa la sogs pa la ma grub ba yin no //
translated: The individual manifestations are one. This is not established for the Buddhists, the VaiÅ›eá¹£ikas, and so on.

original: dbang las byung ba nyid la sogs pa la dngos po 'am ci zhes nges par rtogs pa'i bya ba ni gsal ba rnams las tha mi dad pa'am /
analyzed: dbang las byung ba nyid la sogs pa la dngos po 'am ci zhes nges par rtogs pa'i bya ba ni gsal ba rnams las tha mi dad pa'am /
translated: The action of ascertaining â€œWhat is the entity that arises from the sense faculties?â€ is not different from the manifestations.

original: sna tshogs pa nyid kyi tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa rnams gsal ba yin no ;
analyzed: sna tshogs pa nyid kyi tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa rnams gsal ba yin no ;
translated: The various distinctions of difference and non-difference are clarified.

original: / de la thun mong ma yin pa dang ma grub pa dang bsgrub bya ma tshang ba dang mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la ma tshang ba nyid kyi rjes su 'brangs nas brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: / de la thun mong ma yin pa dang ma grub pa dang bsgrub bya ma tshang ba dang mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la ma tshang ba nyid kyi rjes su 'brangs nas brjod par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therein, the uncommon, the unestablished, the incomplete probandum, and the incomplete similar instance are to be stated by following the incompleteness itself.

original: rgol ba la ltos nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sun 'byin pa'i lam dngos po gnyis su med par bsgrub pa la /
analyzed: rgol ba la ltos nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sun 'byin pa'i lam dngos po gnyis su med par bsgrub pa la /
translated: With regard to in relation to the opponent, and so on, the non-duality of the two entities of the path of refutation is taught.

original: grub pa'i mtha' tha dad pa la brten par mi rigs pa'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' tha dad pa la brten par mi rigs pa'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is unreasonable to rely on different philosophical tenets.

original: grub pa la yang /ğŸ”½khyab par gnod min zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: grub pa la yang / khyab par gnod min zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: With regard to even if established,

original: de bzhin du khyad par yongs su rtogs pa la yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du khyad par yongs su rtogs pa la yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is taught that there is no pervasion, and so on. It is taught that in the same way, there is also the complete understanding of the distinction,

original: ma nges pa'am zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: ma nges pa'am zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'o //
translated: and the uncertain, and so on, are the uncommon [reasons].

original: thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs mtshungs pa nyid kyis thun mong gi ma nges pa'o //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs mtshungs pa nyid kyis thun mong gi ma nges pa'o //
translated: â€œBy virtue of its being uncommonâ€ means that it is not a common, uncertain reason by virtue of the similarity of the property of the subject to the similar instance.

original: nam mkha'i yon tan nyid dang yon tan gsum nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par ma grub pa yin na /
analyzed: nam mkha'i yon tan nyid dang yon tan gsum nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par ma grub pa yin na /
translated: If the uncommonness of sound is not established, then the quality of space, the quality of the three, etc., are not established.

original: sgra ni rang gi ngo bo'i chos can nyid kyis grub pa kho na yin par mi rigs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: sgra ni rang gi ngo bo'i chos can nyid kyis grub pa kho na yin par mi rigs pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isnâ€™t it reasonable that sound is established just by virtue of its own nature?

original: gang gi phyir khyad par med pa spyi la ni ma mthong ba'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir khyad par med pa spyi la ni ma mthong ba'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa la /
translated: Because the general is not seen without the particular.

original: chos can nyid ni tshad mas grub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: chos can nyid ni tshad mas grub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: To respond: The subject is established by valid cognition.

original: grub pa'i mtha' las grags pa'i khyad par ma grub pa yin yang /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' las grags pa'i khyad par ma grub pa yin yang /
translated: Although the particular that is renowned in the philosophical tenet systems is not established,

original: mngon sum gyi tshad mas grub pa'i dngos po ni yod pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi tshad mas grub pa'i dngos po ni yod pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the thing that is established by the valid cognition of direct perception does exist. This is the meaning.

original: lung las grags pa'i bye brag med kyang snang ba las byung ba'i shes pa'i gzung bya'i ngo go bo kho nas /
analyzed: lung las grags pa'i bye brag med kyang snang ba las byung ba'i shes pa'i gzung bya'i ngo go bo kho nas /
translated: Although there is no difference in the particular as it is known from scripture,

original: don gyi bya ba byed pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: don gyi bya ba byed pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: it is shown that the object is the agent of activity by the nature of the object of the consciousness that arises from appearance.

original: khyad par yongs su rtogs pa yang //
analyzed: khyad par yongs su rtogs pa yang //
translated: The complete understanding of the particular

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is also like that.

original: byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i gsal ba rnams las gzhan pa ma yin pa'am /
analyzed: byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i gsal ba rnams las gzhan pa ma yin pa'am /
translated: It is not different from the manifestations of being produced, etc.

original: sna tshogs pa'am gzhan ma yin pa yang gsal ba so so las tha dad pa'am /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'am gzhan ma yin pa yang gsal ba so so las tha dad pa'am /
translated: Or it is not different from the manifold, or it is not different from the individual manifestations,

original: tha mi dad pa yang rung ba'o //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa yang rung ba'o //
translated: or it is not different from that.

original: de bzhin du sna tshogs pa nyid la yang brjod nas thun mong @163b ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa brjod bya ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: de bzhin du sna tshogs pa nyid la yang brjod nas thun mong @163b ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa brjod bya ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la /
translated: In the same way, having stated the manifold, is it not the case that the uncommon, etc. are not to be stated?

original: de la gdon mi za bar zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de la gdon mi za bar zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: With regard to that, he says, â€œUndoubtedly.â€

original: gal te rgol ba dang cig shos la ltos pas ma yin pa de lta na /
analyzed: gal te rgol ba dang cig shos la ltos pas ma yin pa de lta na /
translated: If it is not so by way of the opponent and the other, thenğŸ”½what is the cause?

original: rgyu gang yin zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rgyu gang yin zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: He teaches that:

original: mi rtag pa dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: â€œImpermanence,â€ etc.

original: khyad par rab tu grub pa ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: khyad par rab tu grub pa ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The special is the established.

original: rgol ba la sogs pa la ltos nas so //
analyzed: rgol ba la sogs pa la ltos nas so //
translated: In dependence on the opponent, etc.

original: de'i khyad par med na spyi nyid med par 'gyur ba ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: de'i khyad par med na spyi nyid med par 'gyur ba ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la /
translated: If there is no difference in it, would not the universal itself be nonexistent?

original: tshad mas grub pa'i khyad par gzhan yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: tshad mas grub pa'i khyad par gzhan yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The special, established by valid cognition, is taught to be different.

original: rgyu'i de ma thag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu'i de ma thag ces bya ba'o //
translated: The immediate antecedent of the cause is called the special.

original: de'i phyir bsgrub bya'i spyi zhig pa nyid la sogs pa yon tan la sogs pa la skya bo nyid bzhin du bskyed pa dang ldan pa nyid la sogs pa ni sgrub byed kho na yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir bsgrub bya'i spyi zhig pa nyid la sogs pa yon tan la sogs pa la skya bo nyid bzhin du bskyed pa dang ldan pa nyid la sogs pa ni sgrub byed kho na yin la /
translated: Therefore, the universal of the probandum, such as impermanence, etc., is like the whiteness, etc., of the qualities, etc., which are the provers.

original: de'i khyad par la ni de tsam du ma nges pa'i phyir nges pa can gyi khyad par gyi rnam par rtog pas sgrub par byed pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: de'i khyad par la ni de tsam du ma nges pa'i phyir nges pa can gyi khyad par gyi rnam par rtog pas sgrub par byed pa nyid yin te /
translated: But the special of that is not ascertained to that extent, so the ascertainment is the special conceptual thought that establishes it.

original: me la skya bo nyid kyi bye brag lta bu'o //
analyzed: me la skya bo nyid kyi bye brag lta bu'o //
translated: It is like the particular whiteness of fire.

original: sgra yod na don yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra yod na don yod pa ma yin te /
translated: When sound exists, the object does not exist.

original: de lta bu'i rjes su 'gro ba ma mthong ba'i phyir mi rtag pa dang 'chi ba la sogs pa ni rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba dag gis khas blangs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rjes su 'gro ba ma mthong ba'i phyir mi rtag pa dang 'chi ba la sogs pa ni rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba dag gis khas blangs pa ma yin no //
translated: Because such a concomitance is not seen, impermanence, death, etc. are not accepted by the disputants and their opponents.

original: ji ltar phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs thun mong ba ma yin pa ni sgrub byed ma yin par rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji ltar phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs thun mong ba ma yin pa ni sgrub byed ma yin par rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Just as a property common to similar and dissimilar instances is not a logical reason because it is not concomitant,

original: de bzhin du rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba thun mong ma yin pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba thun mong ma yin pa yang ma yin te /
translated: so also it is not uncommon to the disputants and their opponents.

original: ma rtogs pa'i phyir dang / de'i sgrub byed ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma rtogs pa'i phyir dang / de'i sgrub byed ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not understood and because it is not a logical reason for that.

original: sgra la gcig nyid med kyang don la gcig med pa'am gtan tshigs nyid ma yin pa yang ma yin no zhes gnas skabs kyi rjes su 'jug pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sgra la gcig nyid med kyang don la gcig med pa'am gtan tshigs nyid ma yin pa yang ma yin no zhes gnas skabs kyi rjes su 'jug pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Even though there is no oneness in sound, it is not the case that there is no oneness in the object or that it is not a logical reason. This is shown by the expression â€œin that caseâ€:

original: sgra ma grub kyang ste med kyang //ğŸ”½dngos po grub na ste yod na'o //
analyzed: sgra ma grub kyang ste med kyang // dngos po grub na ste yod na'o //
translated: Even though sound is not established,ğŸ”½if the thing is established,

original: grub par 'gyur ba ni bsgrub bya'o //
analyzed: grub par 'gyur ba ni bsgrub bya'o //
translated: then it is established.

original: gal te yang bsgrub bya yul gcig pa nyid kyis sgra grub pa ma yin pa de lta na yang /ğŸ”½don gcig pa'i lus nyid yod pa'i phyir rdul phra rab rnams cha shas dang bcas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te yang bsgrub bya yul gcig pa nyid kyis sgra grub pa ma yin pa de lta na yang / don gcig pa'i lus nyid yod pa'i phyir rdul phra rab rnams cha shas dang bcas pa'am /
translated: Even if it is not established that sound is the same object as what is to be established,

original: mi rtag pa 'grub par mi rigs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: mi rtag pa 'grub par mi rigs pa ma yin nam /
translated: then because the body is the same object, it is not reasonable to establish that the subtle particles have parts or that they are impermanent.

original: lus nyid kyis byas pa'i mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: lus nyid kyis byas pa'i mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa ni /
translated: Impermanence and so on that are produced by the body

original: bum pa la ma yin no //
analyzed: bum pa la ma yin no //
translated: are not in a vase.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: byas pa nyid kyis sbyar ba yin no //
analyzed: byas pa nyid kyis sbyar ba yin no //
translated: They are connected by being produced.

original: des na lus nyid ni sbyor byed ma yin no //
analyzed: des na lus nyid ni sbyor byed ma yin no //
translated: Therefore the body itself is not the connector.

original: gzhan du grub pa'i bsgrub bya la rab tu sbyar ba yod pa'i phyogs 'di la ma grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan du grub pa'i bsgrub bya la rab tu sbyar ba yod pa'i phyogs 'di la ma grub pa'i phyir /
translated: In this system where there is connection to what is to be established that is established as something else, it is not established.

original: ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: ma grub pa yin no //
translated: Therefore it is not established.

original: de lta @164a * //
analyzed: de lta @164a * //
translated: If that is so,

original: yin na gtan tshigs ltar snang ba thams cad ma grub pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: yin na gtan tshigs ltar snang ba thams cad ma grub pa kho na yin no //
translated: then all seeming reasons are not established.

original: rgyu mtshan gzhan yod pa las mi gzhan thob pa yin te /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gzhan yod pa las mi gzhan thob pa yin te /
translated: Obtainment is not different from the other reason.

original: 'di ltar phyogs dang mthun pa ma yin pa dag la nges pa'i phyir thun mong gi ma nges pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar phyogs dang mthun pa ma yin pa dag la nges pa'i phyir thun mong gi ma nges pa yin te /
translated: Since it is ascertained in regard to what is not similar to the property-possessor, it is inconclusive in regard to the common locus.

original: phyin ci log pa dag nges pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: phyin ci log pa dag nges pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Since it is ascertained in regard to what is contrary, it is contradictory.

original: phyogs gnyi ga dang 'brel ba'i phyir gnas skabs mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: phyogs gnyi ga dang 'brel ba'i phyir gnas skabs mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: Since it is related to both sides, it is inconclusive in regard to the similar and dissimilar instances.

original: gnod par byed pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir dus las 'das par smra ba'o //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir dus las 'das par smra ba'o //
translated: Since it is the domain of refutation, it is beyond the time.

original: 'di ni rgyu mtshan gzhan med pa'i phyir ma grub pa kho na yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: 'di ni rgyu mtshan gzhan med pa'i phyir ma grub pa kho na yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: He thinks that this is only unestablished because there is no other reason.

original: de lta na yang des mngon par 'dod pa'i don zhes bya ba smos te /ğŸ”½'di'i sbyor byed gang yin du ba la me bzhin du rgyu mtshan nyid la /
analyzed: de lta na yang des mngon par 'dod pa'i don zhes bya ba smos te / 'di'i sbyor byed gang yin du ba la me bzhin du rgyu mtshan nyid la /
translated: Even so, it is said that â€œthe object that is intended by him.â€ğŸ”½The reason is like fire in regard to smoke, which is the object to be established.

original: rab tu sbyor ba nyid kyang du ba bzhin du rgyu mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: rab tu sbyor ba nyid kyang du ba bzhin du rgyu mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: The application itself is like smoke, which is the reason.

original: de lta na ro ni gzugs la sogs pa'i sbyar bya'am sbyor byed ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta na ro ni gzugs la sogs pa'i sbyar bya'am sbyor byed ma yin no //
translated: In that case, taste is neither the object to be established nor the means of establishing form, etc.

original: de bzhin du shing nyid las shing sha pa nyid ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du shing nyid las shing sha pa nyid ngo //
translated: In the same way, a Å›imÅ›apÄ is from a tree.

original: 'on te med na mi 'byung ba byas pa nyid la sogs pa sbyor byed nyid dam cig shos yin no //
analyzed: 'on te med na mi 'byung ba byas pa nyid la sogs pa sbyor byed nyid dam cig shos yin no //
translated: But if it is not, then the reason is either the action itself or the other.

original: de 'di ni lus nyid la sogs pa yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: de 'di ni lus nyid la sogs pa yang mtshungs so //
translated: This is also the same for the body itself and so on.

original: 'on te rgyu rdul phra rab rnams ni rags pa nyid las gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid kyis rjes su dpag bya rnams kyi cha shas dang bcas pa nyid kyis mtha' med pa'i phyir ri rab dang yungs kar dag gi bong tshod dang lci yang nyid mnyam par
analyzed: 'on te rgyu rdul phra rab rnams ni rags pa nyid las gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid kyis rjes su dpag bya rnams kyi cha shas dang bcas pa nyid kyis mtha' med pa'i phyir ri rab dang yungs kar dag gi bong tshod dang lci yang nyid mnyam par
translated: But if the cause, the subtle particles, are not tenable as anything other than grossness, then the inferred objects would have parts and would be infinite. Therefore the size and weight of Mount Meru and a mustard seed would be the same.ğŸ”½Therefore, because they are partless and because they are impermanent, things would arise from nonthings, since there would be no basis for a cause.

original: 'gyur ro // de'i phyir cha shas med pa'i phyir la mi rtag pa nyid yin yang rgyu'i rtsa ba med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa las dngos po skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rjes su dpag pa ni mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i sgrub byed kyi lus nyidğŸ”½la gnod par byed pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'gyur ro // de'i phyir cha shas med pa'i phyir la mi rtag pa nyid yin yang rgyu'i rtsa ba med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa las dngos po skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rjes su dpag pa ni mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i sgrub byed kyi lus nyidğŸ”½la gnod par byed pa nyid yin te /
translated: This inference is a refutation of the body itself as a proof of impermanence and so on.

original: de med na chos can mi 'grub pas 'di'i 'jug pa yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med na chos can mi 'grub pas 'di'i 'jug pa yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it does not exist, the subject is not established, and so the engagement of this is also nonexistent.

original: bden mod kyi chos can tsam sgrub par byed ba la ltos nas cha shas dang bcas pa dang / mi rtag pa yang sgrub par byed pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: bden mod kyi chos can tsam sgrub par byed ba la ltos nas cha shas dang bcas pa dang / mi rtag pa yang sgrub par byed pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: Although this is true, there is no fault, because the establishment of the subject is dependent on the establishment of the mere subject, and because impermanence is also established.

original: bong tshod dang lci yang mnyam pa yin pa dang / thams cad dngos po med pa las dngos po skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba yang /
analyzed: bong tshod dang lci yang mnyam pa yin pa dang / thams cad dngos po med pa las dngos po skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba yang /
translated: The same size and weight, and the arising of an entity from a nonentity,

original: ji ltar mthong bas de nyid du rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir dang / dngos po gzhan yang de kho na 'dra bar dus gzhan nyid khas blangs pa'i phyir yang ngo //
analyzed: ji ltar mthong bas de nyid du rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir dang / dngos po gzhan yang de kho na 'dra bar dus gzhan nyid khas blangs pa'i phyir yang ngo //
translated: are also because of the establishment of the mere entity, and because of the acceptance of another entity at another time, just as it is seen.

original: ma grub pa nyid kyis sam khyad par la yang rgyu mtshan gzhan yod @164b pa'i phyir ming gzhan 'jug par mi rigs so //
analyzed: ma grub pa nyid kyis sam khyad par la yang rgyu mtshan gzhan yod @164b pa'i phyir ming gzhan 'jug par mi rigs so //
translated: It is not reasonable for another name to be engaged because of nonestablishment, or because of a difference, or because of the existence of another reason.

original: 'di nyid kyi myur du go ba nyid kyis pham pa'i gzhi nyid kyis mthar thug pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi myur du go ba nyid kyis pham pa'i gzhi nyid kyis mthar thug pa yin te /
translated: This very quick understanding is the basis of defeat, and so it is final.

original: rgyu mtshan gzhan la  med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gzhan la  med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: because it is not found in other causes.

original: ji ltar sgrub byed la sgra'i dbang nyid du the tshom du gyur pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar sgrub byed la sgra'i dbang nyid du the tshom du gyur pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as there is doubt about the probandum in regard to the power of the word,

original: bsgrub bya la yang yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: bsgrub bya la yang yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: so it is in regard to the probans.

original: gal te ji ltar zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gal te ji ltar zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If it is asked: how?

original: don la ste /
analyzed: don la ste /
translated: in regard to the object,

original: dbyibs la sogs pa la brten pa'i dpyad pa ni /
analyzed: dbyibs la sogs pa la brten pa'i dpyad pa ni /
translated: the investigation of shape, etc.

original: bum pa dang sa gzhi la sogs pa la tha dad par ro //
analyzed: bum pa dang sa gzhi la sogs pa la tha dad par ro //
translated: is different in the case of the pot, the ground, etc.

original: dngos po'i 'khrul pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dngos po'i 'khrul pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The so-called error of entity

original: dngos po ni don de'i'o //
analyzed: dngos po ni don de'i'o //
translated: is that of the object.

original: de bzhin du sgra gcig gi yod pa dang med pa dag gis sgrub byed gcig gi yod pa dang med pa dag gi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra gcig gi yod pa dang med pa dag gis sgrub byed gcig gi yod pa dang med pa dag gi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bkag pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, the existence and non-existence of the one word are refuted by the two verses in regard to the existence and non-existence of the one probans.

original: de'i yod pa dang med pa dag gis bsgrub bya yod pa dang med pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i yod pa dang med pa dag gis bsgrub bya yod pa dang med pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The existence and non-existence of the probandum is not due to the existence and non-existence of that.

original: de ltar ldog par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar ldog par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no apprehension of the exclusion in that way.

original: dbyibs kyi tsam ni sgrub byed ma yin pa nyid de zhes bya ba de la sgrub byad gcig nyid ces pa ltos pa yin no //ğŸ”½de bzhin du sgra yod kyang mi 'byung la med kyang 'byung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dbyibs kyi tsam ni sgrub byed ma yin pa nyid de zhes bya ba de la sgrub byad gcig nyid ces pa ltos pa yin no // de bzhin du sgra yod kyang mi 'byung la med kyang 'byung ba'i phyir /
translated: The mere shape is not the probandum, because the word â€œaloneâ€ in â€œshape alone is not the probandumâ€ is dependent.ğŸ”½Similarly, sound is not the probandum because it occurs even when the probandum does not exist and it also occurs even when the probandum does not exist.

original: sgrub byed ni de'i dbang ma yin no zhes zer bas bsgrub byed med na sgra yod kyang mi 'grub pa la /
analyzed: sgrub byed ni de'i dbang ma yin no zhes zer bas bsgrub byed med na sgra yod kyang mi 'grub pa la /
translated: If the probandum does not exist, sound is not established even though it exists.

original: de med kyang sgrub byed yod na 'grub pa yin pas de'i dbang du 'gyur ba yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //ğŸ”½de'i phyir gang la yang sgra rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: de med kyang sgrub byed yod na 'grub pa yin pas de'i dbang du 'gyur ba yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // de'i phyir gang la yang sgra rtag pa yin te /
translated: If the probandum exists, it is established even though it does not exist, so it is the probandum.

original: gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir ro //ğŸ”½mi rtag pa yang yin te /
analyzed: gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir ro // mi rtag pa yang yin te /
translated: Therefore, in the case of the argument, â€œSound is permanent because it is an object of comprehension,â€

original: mig gis gzung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gzhal bya nyid la sogs pa'i sgra ni rang gi brjod bya nye bar 'jog par byed pa nyid kyis gcig bsgrub bya'i chos la ma 'khrul pa yin la /
analyzed: mig gis gzung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gzhal bya nyid la sogs pa'i sgra ni rang gi brjod bya nye bar 'jog par byed pa nyid kyis gcig bsgrub bya'i chos la ma 'khrul pa yin la /
translated: â€œSound is impermanent because it is apprehended by the eye,â€ and so on, the words â€œobject of comprehensionâ€ and so on are nonerroneous with regard to the single probandum because they merely posit their own objects.

original: de dag la yang sgrub byed 'khrul pa'i phyir dang / ma grub pa'i phyir bsgrub bya ni de'i dbang du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de dag la yang sgrub byed 'khrul pa'i phyir dang / ma grub pa'i phyir bsgrub bya ni de'i dbang du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: Because the proof is mistaken with respect to them, and because it is not established, the probandum is not controlled by it.

original: skyon de kho nas skyon can yin la /
analyzed: skyon de kho nas skyon can yin la /
translated: It is faulty just because of that fault.

original: sgra'i yon tan gyis yon tan ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sgra'i yon tan gyis yon tan ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The qualities of sound are taught to be not qualities:

original: de nyid 'khrul la sogs yin na //ğŸ”½zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid 'khrul la sogs yin na // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: That itself is mistaken, etc.

original: sgrub byed kyi yon tan ji lta ba kho nas yon tan yin la /
analyzed: sgrub byed kyi yon tan ji lta ba kho nas yon tan yin la /
translated: The qualities of the proof are just qualities.

original: sgra'i skyon gyis skyon ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra'i skyon gyis skyon ma yin te /
translated: The faults of sound are not faults.

original: ji skad du sgra ma grub kyang dngos po ni zhes smos pa'o //
analyzed: ji skad du sgra ma grub kyang dngos po ni zhes smos pa'o //
translated: As it is said, â€œEven if sound is not established, the thing is.â€

original: de bzhin du de nyid de sgrub byed kyi skyon gyi skyon yang yin gyi /ğŸ”½de'i tshe yon tan dang ldan @165a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du de nyid de sgrub byed kyi skyon gyi skyon yang yin gyi / de'i tshe yon tan dang ldan @165a * //
translated: In the same way, that itself is a fault of the proof.ğŸ”½At that time, the possession of qualities is not the proof.

original: pa nyid skyob byed ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: pa nyid skyob byed ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: sgra'i dngos po'i dbye ba gang yin nas /
analyzed: sgra'i dngos po'i dbye ba gang yin nas /
translated: What is the classification of the entity of sound?

original: gang gis de ltar yin pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gang gis de ltar yin pa bstan pa ni /
translated: What teaches that it is so?

original: dngos las shes bya'i sgra ni sgrub byed kyi yul la yin gyi /
analyzed: dngos las shes bya'i sgra ni sgrub byed kyi yul la yin gyi /
translated: The sound that is known from the entity is the object of the proof.

original: bsgrub bya'i yul la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i yul la ni ma yin no //
translated: but not in the object to be established.

original: de lta yin na ni sgrub byed kyi sbyor ba med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin na ni sgrub byed kyi sbyor ba med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were so, it would follow that there would be no proof by means of a syllogism.

original: des na sgrub par byed pa la dbang bar grub pa yin pas /
analyzed: des na sgrub par byed pa la dbang bar grub pa yin pas /
translated: Therefore, since it is established that the subject is controlled by the proof,

original: de'i skyon kho nas skyon can yin no zhes bya ba ni zhar la byung ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i skyon kho nas skyon can yin no zhes bya ba ni zhar la byung ba yin no //
translated: it is said that it is faulty only because of that fault. This is a digression.

original: rigs gzhan la ni rab grub pa //
analyzed: rigs gzhan la ni rab grub pa //
translated: The two verses, â€œIt is well established in other classesâ€

original: zhes bya ba dang / sgra ma grub kyang dngos po ni //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / sgra ma grub kyang dngos po ni //
translated: and â€œEven though sound is not established, things are established,â€

original: zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis sgrub byed la sgra dbang byed pa ma yin par bstan pas bsgrub bya la sgrub byed dbang byed par gsungs pa yin la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis sgrub byed la sgra dbang byed pa ma yin par bstan pas bsgrub bya la sgrub byed dbang byed par gsungs pa yin la /
translated: indicate that the subject is controlled by the proof, since sound does not control the proof.

original: dngos la dngos ni grub phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos la dngos ni grub phyir ro //
translated: The line, â€œbecause things are established in reality,â€

original: zhes bya ba 'dis rjes su sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis rjes su sgrub pa yin no //
translated: is the conclusion.

original: gang dbang byed pa de kho na'i skyon gyis bsgrub bya 'grub pa la gnod pas sgrub byed kyi sbyor ba skyon can yin gyi sgra'i yon tan ni skyob byed ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di la gtan tshigs nyid kyis rnam par 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: gang dbang byed pa de kho na'i skyon gyis bsgrub bya 'grub pa la gnod pas sgrub byed kyi sbyor ba skyon can yin gyi sgra'i yon tan ni skyob byed ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di la gtan tshigs nyid kyis rnam par 'grel pa ni /
translated: The fault of the subject is what obstructs the establishment of the probandum by the probative argument. The probative argument is faulty, but the quality of the sound is not faulty. This is what is being explained by the reason.

original: ji ltar sgra ma grub kyang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ji ltar sgra ma grub kyang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: â€œEven though the sound is not establishedâ€ means

original: sgrub byed kyi yul ma yin pa nyid kyis bsgrub bya la reg pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgrub byed kyi yul ma yin pa nyid kyis bsgrub bya la reg pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: that it does not touch the probandum because it is not the object of the probative argument.

original: gal te yang sgra bsgrub bya la dngos su reg pa ma yin yang sgrub byed kyi sgo nas reg pa kho na yin no zhe na /ğŸ”½sgra ni bsgrub bya la dngos su reg par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te yang sgra bsgrub bya la dngos su reg pa ma yin yang sgrub byed kyi sgo nas reg pa kho na yin no zhe na / sgra ni bsgrub bya la dngos su reg par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: Even though the sound does not directly touch the probandum, it does touch it by way of the probative argument.

original: sgrub byed kyi sbyor ba don med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub byed kyi sbyor ba don med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The sound is not able to directly touch the probandum because it would follow that the probative argument would be pointless.

original: sgrub byed kyi sgo nas kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: sgrub byed kyi sgo nas kyang ma yin te /
translated: It does not touch it by way of the probative argument.

original: de ni 'khrul pa la sogs pa'i skyon gyis sgrub byed ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de ni 'khrul pa la sogs pa'i skyon gyis sgrub byed ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: That is not a proof, because it is faulty, being mistaken, etc.

original: re zhig dngos po 'khrul pa la sogs par gyur na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: re zhig dngos po 'khrul pa la sogs par gyur na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: First, if the entity is mistaken, etc.

original: dngos po'i ngo bor ma grub pa la 'di yin zhes bya bas sems pa can bzhin du mi rtag pa nyid la yang bskyed pa la sogs pa tsam sgrub byed du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po'i ngo bor ma grub pa la 'di yin zhes bya bas sems pa can bzhin du mi rtag pa nyid la yang bskyed pa la sogs pa tsam sgrub byed du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is not established as the entityâ€™s nature, then like the mind that thinks â€œthis is,â€ impermanence, etc. would not be a proof of mere production, etc.ğŸ”½The reply to the objection that the non-establishment of the reason for one party is as if it were non-established for both parties, or that it is based on different tenets, is that

original: rgol ba la sogs pa la stos nas sam gcig la ma grub pa ni ma grub pa bzhin du grub kyang /ğŸ”½grub mtha' tha dad pa la brten par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i thal ches pa bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: rgol ba la sogs pa la stos nas sam gcig la ma grub pa ni ma grub pa bzhin du grub kyang / grub mtha' tha dad pa la brten par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i thal ches pa bsal ba yin no //
translated: the reason is not non-established for both parties, because the reason is established for the proponent, even though it is not established for the opponent.ğŸ”½The reply to the objection that the reason is based on different tenets is that the reason is not based on different tenets, because the reason is based on the tenets of the proponent, even though it is not based on the tenets of the opponent.

original: bsgrub bya'i rjes 'gro phyir 'bras la //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i rjes 'gro phyir 'bras la //
translated: The reply to the objection that the reason is not established because it is based on the tenets of the proponent is that the reason is not not established because it is based on the tenets of the proponent, because the reason is established by a valid cognition for the proponent.ğŸ”½The reply to the objection that the reason is not established because it is based on the tenets of the opponent is that the reason is not not established because it is based on the tenets of the opponent, because the reason is not established by a valid cognition for the opponent.ğŸ”½The reply to the objection that the reason is not established because it is based on the tenets of both parties is that the reason is not not established because it is based on the tenets of both parties, because the reason is established by a valid cognition for one party, even though it is not established for the other party.

original: zhes bya ba 'dis kyang @165b sems pa can la dbyibs la sogs pa'i dpe dang dpe can dag tha dad pa yin par gsungs pas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis kyang @165b sems pa can la dbyibs la sogs pa'i dpe dang dpe can dag tha dad pa yin par gsungs pas /
translated: The reply to the objection that the reason is not established because it is based on the tenets of neither party is that the reason is not not established because it is based on the tenets of neither party, because the reason is established by a valid cognition for one party, even though it is not established for the other party.ğŸ”½The reply to the objection that the reason is not established because it is based on the tenets of the proponent is that the reason is not not established because it is based on the tenets of the proponent, because the reason is established by a valid cognition for the proponent.

original: lhag chod du sbyar ba yin no zhes rgol ba ni bsgrub bya 'bras bu nyid la btsal ma thag tu 'byung ba nyid ni bskyed pa la yod pa'am /
analyzed: lhag chod du sbyar ba yin no zhes rgol ba ni bsgrub bya 'bras bu nyid la btsal ma thag tu 'byung ba nyid ni bskyed pa la yod pa'am /
translated: Those who argue that it is applied to the remainder are refuted because the mere arising of the effect that is the object of attainment is present in the cause.ğŸ”½

original: mngon par gsal ba la yod pa la ltag chod du bstan pas gsal ba yin la /ğŸ”½sems pa can gyi khyad par ma grub pa'am /
analyzed: mngon par gsal ba la yod pa la ltag chod du bstan pas gsal ba yin la / sems pa can gyi khyad par ma grub pa'am /
translated: The response that this is a reductio argument is clear, since the mere arising of the effect, the object to be established, is shown to be a consequence that is contradictory to the cause generating it or to the cause manifesting it.ğŸ”½It is not redundant, because the distinction of the mind is not established,

original: rjes su dpag pa thams cad la khyad par ma grub pa'i thal bar 'gyur ba gsal ba yin pa'i phyir zlos pa ma yin no //ğŸ”½bum pa dang ri la sogs pa la bskyed pa'am dbyibs kyang rung ste /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa thams cad la khyad par ma grub pa'i thal bar 'gyur ba gsal ba yin pa'i phyir zlos pa ma yin no // bum pa dang ri la sogs pa la bskyed pa'am dbyibs kyang rung ste /
translated: or because the consequence that the distinction is not established is clear in all inferences.

original: rigs mi mthun pa nyid kyis tha dad pa yin te /
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa nyid kyis tha dad pa yin te /
translated: A pot and a mountain, for example, are different because they are of different types, whether it be their shape or their production.

original: de'i phyir bum pa la yod par ma grub pa'am /
analyzed: de'i phyir bum pa la yod par ma grub pa'am /
translated: Therefore, it is not established that they exist in a pot,ğŸ”½or, the word â€œorâ€ indicates that it is also not established that they exist in a mountain, etc.,

original: yang na zhes bya ba 'dis ri la sogs pa la yang yod pa thun mong ba dang / yang na dpe la the tshom za ba yin zhes bya ba bstan nas /
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba 'dis ri la sogs pa la yang yod pa thun mong ba dang / yang na dpe la the tshom za ba yin zhes bya ba bstan nas /
translated: or, the word â€œorâ€ indicates that there is doubt about the example.

original: da ni mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa bzhin du /
analyzed: da ni mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa bzhin du /
translated: Now, in the same way that impermanence, etc.,

original: gzhal bya nyid de tsam du thun mong ba yin par bstan pa ni ji ltar dngos po de zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gzhal bya nyid de tsam du thun mong ba yin par bstan pa ni ji ltar dngos po de zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The commonality of the object of knowledge to that extent is shown by the words â€œjust that entity.â€

original: ji ltar de ni dbyibs la sogs pa tsam mo //
analyzed: ji ltar de ni dbyibs la sogs pa tsam mo //
translated: Just that is the mere shape, etc.

original: dngos po zhes bya ba ni khyad par la ltos pa ma yin par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po zhes bya ba ni khyad par la ltos pa ma yin par bstan pa'o //
translated: The word â€œentityâ€ shows that it is not dependent on a particular.

original: rgyu ni nye bar dmigs pa'i 'bras bu la tshad ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu ni nye bar dmigs pa'i 'bras bu la tshad ma yin te /
translated: The cause is a valid cognition in regard to the effect that is perceived.

original: bum pa la sogs pa la de tsam gyi sems pa can tsam dang lhan cig par mthong ba'i phyir de kho na bzhin du /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa la de tsam gyi sems pa can tsam dang lhan cig par mthong ba'i phyir de kho na bzhin du /
translated: Because a pot, etc. is seen to be concomitant with the mere cognition of that much,

original: ri la sogs pa la sems pa can dang lhan cig par ma mthong ba'i phyir rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: ri la sogs pa la sems pa can dang lhan cig par ma mthong ba'i phyir rgyu ma yin te /
translated: a mountain, etc. is not seen to be concomitant with the mere cognition of that much, and therefore is not the cause.

original: tshad ma ma yin pa la ma nges pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tshad ma ma yin pa la ma nges pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not a valid cognition, and is indeterminate.

original: phyogs kyi 'khrul pa yin na gang la rjes su dpag pa ma yin pa ma yin /
analyzed: phyogs kyi 'khrul pa yin na gang la rjes su dpag pa ma yin pa ma yin /
translated: If it is an error of the position, then what is not an inference?

original: mngon sum nyid kyang nam mkha' la sogs pa phyogs su byed pas mi rtag pa nyid du sgrub byed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon sum nyid kyang nam mkha' la sogs pa phyogs su byed pas mi rtag pa nyid du sgrub byed du 'gyur ro //
translated: Even direct perception, by making space, etc. a position, would be a proof of impermanence.

original: de'i phyir phyogs su byed pa ni 'dod pas sprul pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir phyogs su byed pa ni 'dod pas sprul pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, the direction is asserted to be emanated by desire.

original: des dngos su ba'i ma nges pa nyid gsal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des dngos su ba'i ma nges pa nyid gsal ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the position that shape is not a real entity is not established.ğŸ”½Thus, the shape of the body is not the object of the eye consciousness.ğŸ”½If that is so, then what is the object of the eye consciousness?

original: gang gi tshe de lta yin pa de'i tshe de ni ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de lta yin pa de'i tshe de ni ste /
translated: The object of the eye consciousness is the color of the body.

original: dbyibs tsam ni rgyu gang gis tshad mar 'dod cing /
analyzed: dbyibs tsam ni rgyu gang gis tshad mar 'dod cing /
translated: The shape of the body is the object of mental consciousness.

original: rgyu gang gis rgyu ma yin par mi 'dod /ğŸ”½gzhal bya nyid rgyu yin zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: rgyu gang gis rgyu ma yin par mi 'dod / gzhal bya nyid rgyu yin zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: The shape of the body is not the object of the eye consciousness because it is not the object of the eye consciousness.ğŸ”½For example, the color of the body is not the object of the ear consciousness.

original: rigs pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The shape of the body is the object of mental consciousness because it is the object of mental consciousness.

original: yang na dbang phyug la rgyu nyid 'dzin par byed pa med pa yin la /ğŸ”½rgyu nyid 'dzin par byed @166a * //
analyzed: yang na dbang phyug la rgyu nyid 'dzin par byed pa med pa yin la / rgyu nyid 'dzin par byed @166a * //
translated: For example, the color of the body is the object of mental consciousness.

original: pa'i tshad ma ni yod pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: pa'i tshad ma ni yod pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The shape of the body is the object of mental consciousness because it is the object of mental consciousness.

original: ji ltar de ni dbang phyug yin par bshad la rgyu nyid kyis shes 'dod pa ni /
analyzed: ji ltar de ni dbang phyug yin par bshad la rgyu nyid kyis shes 'dod pa ni /
translated: For example, the color of the body is the object of mental consciousness.ğŸ”½The shape of the body is the object of mental consciousness because it is the object of mental consciousness.

original: gnas skabs kyi ri la sogs pa la yin gyi /ğŸ”½de'i cha shas la sogs pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gnas skabs kyi ri la sogs pa la yin gyi /ğŸ”½de'i cha shas la sogs pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: For example, the color of the body is the object of mental consciousness.

original: de lta nyid de de'i rgyu ma yin par lha sbyin la sogs pa 'dod pa yin gyi cha shas la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta nyid de de'i rgyu ma yin par lha sbyin la sogs pa 'dod pa yin gyi cha shas la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not asserted that the parts and so on are the cause of the vase.ğŸ”½

original: de las byung ba nyid du mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las byung ba nyid du mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But it is not the case that the parts and so on are not asserted to be the cause of the effect, because it is not known that the effect arises from them.

original: de ni ste /
analyzed: de ni ste /
translated: That is so,

original: dbang phyug cas bya ba kho na gang gis rgyu yin par 'dod cing /
analyzed: dbang phyug cas bya ba kho na gang gis rgyu yin par 'dod cing /
translated: because it is only God who is asserted to be the cause and not anything else.

original: gang gis rgyu ma yin par mi 'dod /
analyzed: gang gis rgyu ma yin par mi 'dod /
translated: And by what is God not asserted to be the cause?

original: de lta na ni lha sbyin la sogs pa yang rgyu yin par thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na ni lha sbyin la sogs pa yang rgyu yin par thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: If that were so, then it would follow that Devadatta and so on would be the cause,

original: de las byung ba nyid du shes pa ma yin pa nyid du bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las byung ba nyid du shes pa ma yin pa nyid du bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no difference in that they are not known to be the cause.

original: cha shas la sogs pa'i rgyus lha sbyin la sogs pa rgyu nyid du bsgrun bzod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: cha shas la sogs pa'i rgyus lha sbyin la sogs pa rgyu nyid du bsgrun bzod pa ma yin te /
translated: The parts and so on are not suitable to be the cause of Devadatta and so on,ğŸ”½because there is no difference in that they are and are not known to be the cause.

original: de las byung ba nyid du shes pa yod pa dang med pa dag gis bye brag med pa'i phyir ro zhes kyang bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de las byung ba nyid du shes pa yod pa dang med pa dag gis bye brag med pa'i phyir ro zhes kyang bstan pa ni /
translated: The following is also taught:

original: ji ltar de ni cha shas la sogs pa'i dngos po ste /
analyzed: ji ltar de ni cha shas la sogs pa'i dngos po ste /
translated: How is it that the parts and so on are the entity of the effect?

original: rgyu'i yin te de las byung ba nyid du shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu'i yin te de las byung ba nyid du shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is known that it arises from that.

original: de bzhin du de rgyu ma yin par yang grub pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du de rgyu ma yin par yang grub pa yin te /
translated: In the same way, it is established that it is not the cause,

original: de las byung ba yin par shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las byung ba yin par shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is known that it does not arise from that.

original: gang gi tshe de lta yin pa de'i tshe de ni ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de lta yin pa de'i tshe de ni ste /
translated: When that is so, then thatâ€”

original: dbang phyug ces bya ba de las byung ba ma yin par shes pa na /
analyzed: dbang phyug ces bya ba de las byung ba ma yin par shes pa na /
translated: that is, the so-called Godâ€”is not known to be the cause.

original: gang gis rgyur 'dod cing gang gis rgyu ma yin par mi 'dod /
analyzed: gang gis rgyur 'dod cing gang gis rgyu ma yin par mi 'dod /
translated: By what is it asserted to be the cause? By what is it not asserted to be the cause?

original: de lta yin na lha sbyin la sogs pa la yang rgyu yin par bye brag med par snga ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de lta yin na lha sbyin la sogs pa la yang rgyu yin par bye brag med par snga ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: If that were so, then Devadatta and so on would also be the cause, just as God is.

original: gal te de las byung ba nyid du shes pa med kyang dbang phyug de rgyu yin na lha sbyin la sogs pa yang de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de las byung ba nyid du shes pa med kyang dbang phyug de rgyu yin na lha sbyin la sogs pa yang de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is known that it arises from that, but God is the cause, then Devadatta and so on would also be the same.

original: gzhan du na ni rdza mkhan gyis zhes bya bas 'di thal bar 'gyur du bsgrubs pa yin na /
analyzed: gzhan du na ni rdza mkhan gyis zhes bya bas 'di thal bar 'gyur du bsgrubs pa yin na /
translated: Otherwise, if it is established that the consequence is that â€œthe potter is the cause of the pot,â€

original: ci'i phyir bstan zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir bstan zhe na /
translated: why is it stated?

original: gong du ni 'ji ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba nyid bye brag dang bcas pa ni dbang phyug las bzlog pa yin par sgrub par byed par bstan pa yin la /
analyzed: gong du ni 'ji ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba nyid bye brag dang bcas pa ni dbang phyug las bzlog pa yin par sgrub par byed par bstan pa yin la /
translated: Above, it was shown that the very cause of clay, along with its particulars, is established as the opposite of God.

original: 'dir ni de kho na'i dbyibs la yin pa'i phyir bzlog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni de kho na'i dbyibs la yin pa'i phyir bzlog pa ma yin no //
translated: But here, it is not the opposite because of the shape of that very thing.

original: yang na dbyibs la sogs pa gnas skabs mtshungs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: yang na dbyibs la sogs pa gnas skabs mtshungs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Or, the teaching of the similarity of the state of shape, etc.

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: is â€œJust asâ€ and so on.

original: de ste dbang phyug ces bya ba gang gi rgyu yin pa ste /
analyzed: de ste dbang phyug ces bya ba gang gi rgyu yin pa ste /
translated: That is, if it is the case that it is the cause of what is called â€œGod,â€

original: de lta nyid de dngos po'i dbyibs la sogs pa la mi rten pa'i bye brag go //
analyzed: de lta nyid de dngos po'i dbyibs la sogs pa la mi rten pa'i bye brag go //
translated: then that very thing, the shape of the entity, etc., is without particulars.

original: rgyu min ni rgyu ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: rgyu min ni rgyu ma yin pa ste /
translated: â€œNot a causeâ€ is not a cause.

original: de rgyu ma @166b yin pa gang gis yin pa de yang bye brag med pa'i dbyibs yin no //
analyzed: de rgyu ma @166b yin pa gang gis yin pa de yang bye brag med pa'i dbyibs yin no //
translated: That which is not a cause is also shape without particulars.

original: 'di'i rgyud dbang phyug gam cig shos yin zhes dpyod par byed pa yin zhes de'i phyir gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i rgyud dbang phyug gam cig shos yin zhes dpyod par byed pa yin zhes de'i phyir gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin no //
translated: Since it is analyzed whether his continuum is God or something else, therefore it is a fallacious reason.

original: the tshom gyi rgyu yin yang ma nges pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: the tshom gyi rgyu yin yang ma nges pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not the case that the cause of doubt is not ascertained.

original: mngon sum ltar snang bas kyang ma nges pa nyid thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum ltar snang bas kyang ma nges pa nyid thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For, even though it appears to be perception, it is not ascertained.

original: de'i phyir gnyi ga'i mthar nges pa can ni ma nges pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnyi ga'i mthar nges pa can ni ma nges pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is only that which is ascertained as both that is not ascertained, not anything else.

original: rtag pa'i chos mi dmigs pa bzlog pa las dmigs pa'i ngo bo ni khyad par dang bcas pa ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ma yin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: rtag pa'i chos mi dmigs pa bzlog pa las dmigs pa'i ngo bo ni khyad par dang bcas pa ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ma yin pa ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the form of non-apprehension of a permanent entity, which is the opposite of the negation of the existence of a permanent entity, a fallacious reason?

original: de bzhin du mi rtag pa'i chos nye bar dmigs pa yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du mi rtag pa'i chos nye bar dmigs pa yang ngo //
translated: Similarly, the apprehension of an impermanent entity is also.

original: 'on te ma dmigs pa tsam ni ma nges pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: 'on te ma dmigs pa tsam ni ma nges pa kho na yin te /
translated: But if the mere non-apprehension is not ascertained,

original: yod pa dang med pa thun mong pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa thun mong pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because of the commonality of existence and non-existence,

original: de ltar de bzhin yin na dbyibs tsam ni ma nges pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin yin na dbyibs tsam ni ma nges pa yin gyi /
translated: then in that case, the mere shape is not ascertained,

original: khyad par nges pa can yin no /
analyzed: khyad par nges pa can yin no /
translated: but the particular is ascertained.

original: de ltar yin yang dbyibs la sogs pa ni sgrub byed ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ltar yin yang dbyibs la sogs pa ni sgrub byed ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Even though that is so, shape, etc. are not the probandum, this is the meaning.

original: bshad pa mdzad pa po ni dbang phyug rtag par khas len pa yin na /
analyzed: bshad pa mdzad pa po ni dbang phyug rtag par khas len pa yin na /
translated: The author of the explanation accepts that God is permanent.

original: mi rtag pa la'ang tshad ma mad /
analyzed: mi rtag pa la'ang tshad ma mad /
translated: But if he is impermanent, he is not a valid means of knowledge.

original: ces bya ba'i 'ang gi sgra mtshon pa yin la /
analyzed: ces bya ba'i 'ang gi sgra mtshon pa yin la /
translated: The word â€œalsoâ€ indicates that.

original: de ni nam mkha' la sogs pa dang rtag pa nyid du khyad par med pas rgyu nyid dang cig shos nyid dag la dbye ba med par 'gyur ro zhes 'chad pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni nam mkha' la sogs pa dang rtag pa nyid du khyad par med pas rgyu nyid dang cig shos nyid dag la dbye ba med par 'gyur ro zhes 'chad pa yin no //
translated: Since there is no difference between God and such things as space in being permanent, there would be no distinction between being a cause and not being a cause.

original: de yang de las byung ba nyid kyis shes pa med par bye brag med pa kho na yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang de las byung ba nyid kyis shes pa med par bye brag med pa kho na yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, since there is no difference between them in that they are not known to arise from that,

original: rtag pa dang mi rtag par khas len pa dag la bye brag ci yang med do //
analyzed: rtag pa dang mi rtag par khas len pa dag la bye brag ci yang med do //
translated: there is no difference between those who accept God as permanent and those who do not.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: Similarly,

original: mtshon dang sman sogs dang 'brel las //
analyzed: mtshon dang sman sogs dang 'brel las //
translated: from the connection with weapons, medicine, and so on,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: and so on.

original: yul nges par ston pa yin no //ğŸ”½gzhan du na shin du 'brel par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la mi mgu bas /
analyzed: yul nges par ston pa yin no // gzhan du na shin du 'brel par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la mi mgu bas /
translated: This indicates the object of ascertainment.ğŸ”½Otherwise, there would be no connection at all.

original: yang na ji ltar bskyed pa las sngar zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: yang na ji ltar bskyed pa las sngar zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Since this is unacceptable, he says, â€œOr else, how could it be prior to what is generated?â€

original: rtag las skye ba mi 'thad phyir //ğŸ”½zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rtag las skye ba mi 'thad phyir // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: because it is untenable that an effect arises from a permanent cause.

original: rtag ba nyid yin pas 'bras bu yod pa dang med pa'i dus su bya ba med par 'dug pa yin par bstan nas /
analyzed: rtag ba nyid yin pas 'bras bu yod pa dang med pa'i dus su bya ba med par 'dug pa yin par bstan nas /
translated: Since it is permanent, it is shown that the effect does not exist at the time of the cause and does not exist at the time of the cause and does not exist at the time of the effect.

original: 'dir ni 'dod chags la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dir ni 'dod chags la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir /
translated: Here, the difference is that the effect is accepted as being free from attachment and so on.

original: rtag pa dang mi rtag par khas len pa dang mtshungs pa ni bye brag go //
analyzed: rtag pa dang mi rtag par khas len pa dang mtshungs pa ni bye brag go //
translated: This explanation is similar to the assertion that the effect is permanent or impermanent.ğŸ”½The statement â€œbecause of the existence of the effectâ€ is taught by this verse.

original: bshad pa 'di la ni rgyu yin pa dang / rgyu ma yin pa nyid @167a * //ğŸ”½du 'dzin par /
analyzed: bshad pa 'di la ni rgyu yin pa dang / rgyu ma yin pa nyid @167a * // du 'dzin par /
translated: The statement â€œbecause of the existence of the causeâ€ is taught by the verse â€œThe effect is not seen when the cause is destroyed.â€

original: mtshon dang sman sogs zhes bya ba 'dis bstan pa yin no //ğŸ”½rgyu nyid ni 'ga' zhig gis mngon sum nyid kyis mi shes pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: mtshon dang sman sogs zhes bya ba 'dis bstan pa yin no // rgyu nyid ni 'ga' zhig gis mngon sum nyid kyis mi shes pa ma yin nam /
translated: The statement â€œbecause of the nonexistence of the effectâ€ is taught by the verse â€œThe effect is not seen when the cause is not destroyed.â€ğŸ”½The statement â€œbecause of the nonexistence of the causeâ€ is taught by the verse â€œThe effect is not seen when the cause is not destroyed.â€ğŸ”½The statement â€œbecause of the existence of the causeâ€ is taught by the verse â€œThe effect is not seen when the cause is destroyed.â€

original: 'bras bus kyang dbang po la sogs pa de bzhin du de'i shes pa 'byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /ğŸ”½sdod 'jug ces bya bar sems pa de la lan ni /
analyzed: 'bras bus kyang dbang po la sogs pa de bzhin du de'i shes pa 'byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni / sdod 'jug ces bya bar sems pa de la lan ni /
translated: The statement â€œbecause of the existence of the causeâ€ is taught by the verse â€œThe effect is not seen when the cause is destroyed.â€ğŸ”½The statement â€œbecause of the nonexistence of the causeâ€ is taught by the verse â€œThe effect is not seen when the cause is not destroyed.â€

original: sems pa can dang cig shos dag gi 'bras bu mtshan nyid mi mthun pa yin gyi /
analyzed: sems pa can dang cig shos dag gi 'bras bu mtshan nyid mi mthun pa yin gyi /
translated: The statement â€œbecause of the existence of the causeâ€ is taught by the verse â€œThe effect is not seen when the cause is destroyed.â€ğŸ”½The statement â€œbecause of the nonexistence of the causeâ€ is taught by the verse â€œThe effect is not seen when the cause is not destroyed.â€

original: sems pa can la bye brag med par go bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: sems pa can la bye brag med par go bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: But it is not the case that it is not understood without distinction with regard to sentient beings.

original: da ltar ni sems pa can ma yin pa'i 'bras bu ri la sogs pa gang yin pa de yang rgyu gcig gis bskyed bya ma yin te //
analyzed: da ltar ni sems pa can ma yin pa'i 'bras bu ri la sogs pa gang yin pa de yang rgyu gcig gis bskyed bya ma yin te //
translated: Now, whatever result is not sentient, such as a mountain, etc., is not produced by a single cause.

original: de lta mod kyi tshogs pa can gyi bskyed bya yin la /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi tshogs pa can gyi bskyed bya yin la /
translated: But it is produced by a collection.

original: de la ni sna tshogs pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir sems pa can yang nang du 'dus par 'gyur bar srid pa yin te /
analyzed: de la ni sna tshogs pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir sems pa can yang nang du 'dus par 'gyur bar srid pa yin te /
translated: And it is possible that sentient beings are included in that, because of their diversity.

original: dbang po las 'das pas shes par dka' ba'i phyir dang / med par nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po las 'das pas shes par dka' ba'i phyir dang / med par nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the difficulty of knowing what is beyond the senses, and because of the absence of a certainty of non-existence.

original: yod pa srid pa ni 'bras bu mthong ba las dgag bya ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa srid pa ni 'bras bu mthong ba las dgag bya ma yin te /
translated: The possibility of existence is not denied on the ground of the perception of the result,

original: shin tu yun ring por ma mtshon pa rnams kyang yang nye bar mtshon par dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu yun ring por ma mtshon pa rnams kyang yang nye bar mtshon par dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is observed that even those not perceived for a long time are perceived again.

original: 'bras bu'i dbye ba yang sems pa can la rjes su mi mthun pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i dbye ba yang sems pa can la rjes su mi mthun pa ma yin te /
translated: And the diversity of results is not inconsistent with sentient beings.

original: 'bras bu'i bskyed byar 'dod pa tsam las byung bas mi mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i bskyed byar 'dod pa tsam las byung bas mi mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not similar to the mere assertion that the effect is what is produced.

original: 'di la ma grub pa'am zhes bya ba 'dis ma grub pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'di la ma grub pa'am zhes bya ba 'dis ma grub pa nyid de /
translated: In this regard, the phrase â€œunprovenâ€ means unproven.

original: the tshom za bas ma grub pa nyid dam lan btab pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: the tshom za bas ma grub pa nyid dam lan btab pa ma yin nam /
translated: Is it not the case that the unproven is doubtful, and that it is not a reply?

original: sems pa can du grub par nges pa yin na /
analyzed: sems pa can du grub par nges pa yin na /
translated: If it is certain that the sentient being is proven,

original: de sun dbyung bar bden pa yin na 'dir ni de srid pa ni /
analyzed: de sun dbyung bar bden pa yin na 'dir ni de srid pa ni /
translated: then it is true that it is refuted. But here, that is possible

original: 'bras bu tsam mthong ba las 'byung pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'bras bu tsam mthong ba las 'byung pa yin no zhe na /
translated: because the mere effect is seen.

original: 'on te 'gyur na yang dbang phyug kyang brgya zhig la zhes bya ba la sogs par the tshom za ba ni /
analyzed: 'on te 'gyur na yang dbang phyug kyang brgya zhig la zhes bya ba la sogs par the tshom za ba ni /
translated: But even if it were so, the doubt that â€œeven the powerful one is sometimes . . . â€ and so on

original: 'bras bu la nges byas pa'i khyad par med pas gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu la nges byas pa'i khyad par med pas gsal ba yin no //
translated: is clear because there is no difference in the certainty of the effect.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: In this way,

original: rang bzhin no 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin no 'bras bu ste /
translated: the nature is the effect.

original: de'i dbye ba des byas pa ni khyad par te de med na sems ba can gyi byed pa srid par ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de'i dbye ba des byas pa ni khyad par te de med na sems ba can gyi byed pa srid par ni mi rigs te /
translated: The difference is made by that division. Without that, it is not logical that the activity of the sentient being is possible.

original: dbang po las 'das pa'i byed pa'i bya ba ni des byas pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par mthong na mig gis gzugs shes pa bzhin du nges pa ma yin la /
analyzed: dbang po las 'das pa'i byed pa'i bya ba ni des byas pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par mthong na mig gis gzugs shes pa bzhin du nges pa ma yin la /
translated: The activity of the imperceptible creator is not ascertained by seeing the specific effect produced by it, as is the case with the eye consciousness of form.

original: bye brag med na de yang med pa yin te /
analyzed: bye brag med na de yang med pa yin te /
translated: If there is no distinction, then that also does not exist,

original: dper na de nyid la ro 'dzin @167b bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na de nyid la ro 'dzin @167b bzhin no //
translated: just as there is no tongue sense faculty in the eye.

original: ji ltar de nyid la ro 'dzin gyi srid pa ma yin pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: ji ltar de nyid la ro 'dzin gyi srid pa ma yin pa lta bu'o //
translated: Just as there is no tongue sense faculty in the eye, there is no imperceptible creator.

original: dbang po las 'das pa rnams kyi bya ba yang des byas pa'i khyad par yod pa dang med pa dag gis yod pa dang med pa dag gi nges pa ni rang gi ngo bo bzhin du bya bar dka' ba ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dbang po las 'das pa rnams kyi bya ba yang des byas pa'i khyad par yod pa dang med pa dag gis yod pa dang med pa dag gi nges pa ni rang gi ngo bo bzhin du bya bar dka' ba ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The activity of the imperceptible creator is ascertained by the existence and nonexistence of the specific effect produced by it, just as its own nature is ascertained.

original: da ni 'grel pa rnam par 'byed pa yin te /
analyzed: da ni 'grel pa rnam par 'byed pa yin te /
translated: Now, the commentary is an analysis.

original: sgrub byed ni gzhan du mi 'thad pa yin gyi /
analyzed: sgrub byed ni gzhan du mi 'thad pa yin gyi /
translated: The proof is that it is not tenable as anything else.

original: nam mkha' yod kyang de dang mtshungs pa'i yon tan can de ma yin pa'i gnas las sam gzhan las grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nam mkha' yod kyang de dang mtshungs pa'i yon tan can de ma yin pa'i gnas las sam gzhan las grub pa ma yin te /
translated: Even if space exists, it is not established from a different place or from anything else that has the same qualities as it.

original: gzhan du grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /ğŸ”½ji ltar dbang phyug khyab pa nyid dang rtag pa nyid la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan du grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni / ji ltar dbang phyug khyab pa nyid dang rtag pa nyid la sogs pa ste /
translated: Because it is established as something else.

original: nam mkha' la sogs pa dang mtshungs pa'i yon tan can gzhan du grub pa la gzhan du sems pa ni /
analyzed: nam mkha' la sogs pa dang mtshungs pa'i yon tan can gzhan du grub pa la gzhan du sems pa ni /
translated: Just as ÄªÅ›vara is established as something else, possessing the qualities of pervasiveness, permanence, and so on, which are similar to space and so on, he is conceived as something else.

original: 'on te de ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te de ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But if he is that,

original: de la yang ste shes pa la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro dbyibs bzhin du shes pa la yang nam mkha' nyid rgyu yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la yang ste shes pa la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro dbyibs bzhin du shes pa la yang nam mkha' nyid rgyu yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: then consciousness would also be space because they are similar. The meaning is that space itself is the cause of consciousness, just as it is the cause of shape.

original: mthong ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas kyang rtog pa yin na byed par 'dod pa tsam gyi rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir bor nas rdzas tsam gyi mthar thug pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mthong ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas kyang rtog pa yin na byed par 'dod pa tsam gyi rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir bor nas rdzas tsam gyi mthar thug pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If it is conceived in dependence on what is seen, then it is not the cause of mere desire to act, because it is the final basis of mere substance, having discarded the desire to act.ğŸ”½The response to that is:ğŸ”½Because it is established as something else.

original: nam mkha' kho na la yod pa yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: nam mkha' kho na la yod pa yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The meaning is that it is established as space alone.

original: byed par 'dod pa tsam gyis ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: byed par 'dod pa tsam gyis ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The response to that is:ğŸ”½Because it is established as something else.

original: gal te yang sems pa can gyi khyad par gyis 'bras bu ni las la sogs par mthar thug pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gal te yang sems pa can gyi khyad par gyis 'bras bu ni las la sogs par mthar thug pa yin par bstan pa ni /

analyzed: rang dbang ni phyin ci log tu'o //

analyzed: gal te dbang phyug la ni nus med na zhes bya ba ste /

analyzed: ldog pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu med pa'i dus na med pa ni ldog pa yin la /
translated: â€œBecause of cessationâ€ means that at the time when there is no effect, it does not exist.

analyzed: de'i dus na yod pa'i rtag pa ni der mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: gnyi ga'i de yod na 'byung ba tsam ma yin par bstan pa ni /

translated: â€œIf they existâ€ means:

analyzed: mthong ba de bzhin kho na yin gyi gzhan du rtog pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //

translated: â€œObstructionâ€ means an impediment.

analyzed: thug pa med pa la sogs pa zhes bya bas ni ma mthong ba'i rtog pa yin na mthong ba nyams pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: de'i bskyed bya med na nges par mi 'byung ngo zhes bstan pa yin no ;

analyzed: rgyu nyid du shes par byed pa bstan to //

analyzed: mig dang gzugs kyi khyad par las zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pas 'bras bu dang rgyu phul du byung ba rtogs par byed pas rtag pa rnams kyis 'bras bu med pa'i dus na med pa nyid kyi rgyu nyid ni de go bar byed pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad
translated: The cause is understood from the effect.ğŸ”½The difference in the effect is not possible as a cause.ğŸ”½This is stated again and again.

translated: The summary is stated by the word â€œtherefore.â€

translated: Or, is it that the nature of this valid knowledge of shape, etc. is not to be understood by the apprehension of the object itself, but by the correct teaching of others or by correct understanding?

original: rang gi dus tsam 'dzin pas ni rtag pa nyid spangs par thal bar 'gyur ro //ğŸ”½des na / dngos yod rtogs pas tshad yin phyir /
analyzed: rang gi dus tsam 'dzin pas ni rtag pa nyid spangs par thal bar 'gyur ro // des na / dngos yod rtogs pas tshad yin phyir /
