analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnod pa can ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the statement, â€œBecause it is valid knowledge that realizes the existent object,â€ etc., is not undermined.

original: tshad ma la snang ba'i skad cig ma zhes bya bar rnam par gzhag par mi nus te /
analyzed: tshad ma la snang ba'i skad cig ma zhes bya bar rnam par gzhag par mi nus te /
translated: It is not possible to posit the moment that appears to valid knowledge as the object of that valid knowledge.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sgrub pa po med do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sgrub pa po med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no cognizer.

original: gzhal bya med pa'i rtag par rtogs pa tsam 'ba' zhig yin te /
analyzed: gzhal bya med pa'i rtag par rtogs pa tsam 'ba' zhig yin te /
translated: It is merely the realization of the permanent that lacks an object of comprehension.

original: rtogs pa tsam ni tshad ma nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: rtogs pa tsam ni tshad ma nyid ma yin te /
translated: Mere realization is not valid knowledge.

original: gang gis rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa nyid skad cig ma yin /
analyzed: gang gis rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa nyid skad cig ma yin /
translated: By what is the nature of the object itself apprehended? It is momentary.

original: 'brel pa can las rtogs pa yin na de mi 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i skyon du yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa can las rtogs pa yin na de mi 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i skyon du yang 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is realized from that which is related, then there is the fault that it does not apprehend that, etc.

original: 'di la ni rang gi ngo bo gtogs pa 'bras bu'i bya ba yang med do //
analyzed: 'di la ni rang gi ngo bo gtogs pa 'bras bu'i bya ba yang med do //
translated: And it has no activity of inhering in its own essential nature.

original: rtog pa de rmongs pa nyid las shes par yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: rtog pa de rmongs pa nyid las shes par yang mi rigs te /
translated: And it is not right to know that conception from delusion itself,

original: sgrub byed dang gnod byed med pas the @169b tshom gyi yul can yin pa'i phyir dus gzhan la ji ltar 'gyur ba yin zhes bya ba'i rtsod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: sgrub byed dang gnod byed med pas the @169b tshom gyi yul can yin pa'i phyir dus gzhan la ji ltar 'gyur ba yin zhes bya ba'i rtsod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: because it is the object of doubt, since there is no proof or disproof. And it is not a dispute, saying, â€œHow can it be at another time?â€

original: yul dang dus la sogs pa'i khyad par nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yul dang dus la sogs pa'i khyad par nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the difference of place, time, etc.

original: de ltar na rtag pa zhes bya bar rtog par rnam par gcod par byed pa'i khyad par yod pa tsam ma gtogs pa bye brag gang yang mi snang ngo //
analyzed: de ltar na rtag pa zhes bya bar rtog par rnam par gcod par byed pa'i khyad par yod pa tsam ma gtogs pa bye brag gang yang mi snang ngo //
translated: Thus, except for the mere existence of the difference that excludes the conception of permanence, no other difference appears.

original: de lta bu mi zad pa yin la /
analyzed: de lta bu mi zad pa yin la /
translated: And that is imperishable.

original: 'di lta bu'i 'gro ba thams cad mngon par dbyung ba yang yin pa'i phyir de yang rgyur brjod do //
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i 'gro ba thams cad mngon par dbyung ba yang yin pa'i phyir de yang rgyur brjod do //
translated: And because it is the source of all this world, it is also called the cause.ğŸ”½In this regard,

original: 'di la / bar ma chod pa yod pa can //
analyzed: 'di la / bar ma chod pa yod pa can //
translated: It has an interruption.

original: dngos gang yul dan dus la ni //
analyzed: dngos gang yul dan dus la ni //
translated: That entity which is in a place and time,

original: de ni rtag dang khyab bdag 'dod //
analyzed: de ni rtag dang khyab bdag 'dod //
translated: It is held to be permanent and all-pervading.

original: de'i phyir bdag ni khyab bdag brjod //
analyzed: de'i phyir bdag ni khyab bdag brjod //
translated: Therefore, I am the all-pervading Lord.

original: ces smos pa'o //
analyzed: ces smos pa'o //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: ldog pa ma grub pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: ldog pa ma grub pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is the pervasion unestablished,

original: de ni thams cad du yod pas de med na 'bras bu yod par mi 'grub pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: de ni thams cad du yod pas de med na 'bras bu yod par mi 'grub pa kho na yin te /
translated: because if that were not to exist, the existence of the effect would not be established at all,

original: ldog pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ldog pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the pervasion.

original: rjes su 'gro ba ni de yin na res 'ga' 'byung ba las so //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba ni de yin na res 'ga' 'byung ba las so //
translated: If it is the forward pervasion, it is because of the occurrence of the effect sometimes.

original: thams cad du de yod pa las 'bras bu yang de bzhin du bzhin du yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: thams cad du de yod pa las 'bras bu yang de bzhin du bzhin du yod pa ma yin te /
translated: If it were to exist in all cases, the effect would not exist in that way,

original: de yod na 'byung ba kho na yin no zhes 'bras bu nyid kyi rgyu mtshan de yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yod na 'byung ba kho na yin no zhes 'bras bu nyid kyi rgyu mtshan de yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the reason for the effect is that it occurs only when that exists.

original: de yod na 'byung ba de kho na ma nam /
analyzed: de yod na 'byung ba de kho na ma nam /
translated: If it exists, it occurs only when that exists.

original: gcig kho na rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: gcig kho na rgyu ma yin te /
translated: It is not the cause alone,

original: 'on kyang tshogs pa ni skyed byed ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang tshogs pa ni skyed byed ma yin te /
translated: but rather the collection is not the producer,

original: lhan cig byed pa rnams kyang mi rtag par 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa rnams kyang mi rtag par 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the cooperating causes are assembled as impermanent.

original: lhan cig byed pa rnams kyis de la cung zad kyang byas pa med do //
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa rnams kyis de la cung zad kyang byas pa med do //
translated: The cooperating causes do not do anything to it at all.

original: ma tshang ba nyid du snga na yod pa de tshang bas ldog pa kho na yin pa'i phyir de rgyu yin na des byas pa'i khyad par snang ba yin no zhes bya ba ni mi rigs te khyad par thams cad dbang po'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro
analyzed: ma tshang ba nyid du snga na yod pa de tshang bas ldog pa kho na yin pa'i phyir de rgyu yin na des byas pa'i khyad par snang ba yin no zhes bya ba ni mi rigs te khyad par thams cad dbang po'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro
translated: If it is a cause, then the appearance of the difference that it produces is illogical, because all differences are not objects of the sense faculties.

original: // de lta bu'i phul du byung ba des byas pa yod na yang 'u bu cag la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin la /
analyzed: // de lta bu'i phul du byung ba des byas pa yod na yang 'u bu cag la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin la /
translated: Even if it is produced by such an excellent cause, it is not the domain of experience of us and others.

original: de'i phyir rang gi ngo bo bzhin du rgyu 'di nyid dor bya ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang gi ngo bo bzhin du rgyu 'di nyid dor bya ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, like its own nature, this cause is not to be rejected.

original: the tshom can gyi de nyid lta bu'o //ğŸ”½lan ni / rtag la ldog pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: the tshom can gyi de nyid lta bu'o // lan ni / rtag la ldog pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: It is like the truth of the doubtful.

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The response is: Because the permanent does not reverse.

original: gang sngar bya ba byed pa de'i 'bras bu 'das pa yin yang /
analyzed: gang sngar bya ba byed pa de'i 'bras bu 'das pa yin yang /
translated: If the effect of that which previously performed its function is past,

original: de ther zug tu yod pa yin na cis 'bras bu mi 'byung ba yin /
analyzed: de ther zug tu yod pa yin na cis 'bras bu mi 'byung ba yin /
translated: why would the effect not arise if it were to endure permanently?

original: rgyu med pa ma yin pa ni med par mi rigs so //
analyzed: rgyu med pa ma yin pa ni med par mi rigs so //
translated: It is illogical that it does not exist without a cause.

original: snga ma bzhin du lhan cig byed pa med na mi byed pa yin no zhe na /ğŸ”½de lta yin na byed pa po nyid nyams pa yin pa'i @170a * //ğŸ”½phyir de ji ltar rtag tu yod par 'gyur /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du lhan cig byed pa med na mi byed pa yin no zhe na / de lta yin na byed pa po nyid nyams pa yin pa'i @170a * // phyir de ji ltar rtag tu yod par 'gyur /
translated: If it is as you say, then it is not a permanent cause, because it does not always produce its effect.ğŸ”½If it is as you say, then it is not a permanent cause, because it does not always produce its effect.

original: gang gi 'bras bu med pa'i dus su med par shes pa de 'bras bu'i dus na yod na rgyu nyid yin te /
analyzed: gang gi 'bras bu med pa'i dus su med par shes pa de 'bras bu'i dus na yod na rgyu nyid yin te /
translated: If it is as you say, then it is not a permanent cause, because it does not always produce its effect.

original: dper na lhan cig byed pa lta bu ste yod pa tsam gyis ma yin te /ğŸ”½thal ches pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dper na lhan cig byed pa lta bu ste yod pa tsam gyis ma yin te / thal ches pa'i phyir ro //

original: de'i phyir 'bras bu med pa'i dus su med pa nyid kyis rgyu nyid yin la rtag pa nyid ni de'i dus su pa'am rgyu med par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rigs pa ni /ğŸ”½'di la mtshon byed yin par bya'o //ğŸ”½rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa yan dus su skyed par byed pa'i ngo bo ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'bras bu med pa'i dus su med pa nyid kyis rgyu nyid yin la rtag pa nyid ni de'i dus su pa'am rgyu med par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rigs pa ni / 'di la mtshon byed yin par bya'o // rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa yan dus su skyed par byed pa'i ngo bo ni /
translated: If it is as you say, then it is not a permanent cause, because it does not always produce its effect.ğŸ”½If it is as you say, then it is not a permanent cause, because it does not always produce its effect.ğŸ”½If it is as you say, then it is not a permanent cause, because it does not always produce its effect.ğŸ”½If it is as you say, then it is not a permanent cause, because it does not always produce its effect.ğŸ”½If it is as you say, then it is not a permanent cause, because it does not always produce its effect.ğŸ”½If it is as you say, then it is not a permanent cause, because it does not always produce its effect.ğŸ”½If it is as you say, then it is not a permanent cause, because it does not always produce its effect.ğŸ”½If it is as you say, then it is not a permanent cause, because it does not always produce its effect.ğŸ”½If it is as you say, then it is not a permanent cause, because it does not always produce its effect.ğŸ”½If it is as you say, then it is not a permanent cause, because it does not always produce its effect.ğŸ”½If it is as you say, then it is not a permanent cause, because it does not always produce its effect.

original: rtag pa nyid bya ba med pa'i ngo bo dang 'gal ba yin par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid bya ba med pa'i ngo bo dang 'gal ba yin par bstan pa yin no //
translated: If it is as you say, then it is not a permanent cause, because it does not always produce its effect.ğŸ”½If it is as you say, then it is not a

original: de'i phyir zlos pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir zlos pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, there is no tautology.

original: ldog pa med pa'i phyir 'bras bu med pa'i dus na de med pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ldog pa med pa'i phyir 'bras bu med pa'i dus na de med pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because there is no reversal, when the effect is not present, the cause is not absent,

original: de'i khyad par gyi mi nus pa nyid kyis rgyu nyid yod pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //ğŸ”½'bras bu med pa'i dus na rgyu med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rgyu med pa nyid ni khyab byed yin par bstan pas /
analyzed: de'i khyad par gyi mi nus pa nyid kyis rgyu nyid yod pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to // 'bras bu med pa'i dus na rgyu med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rgyu med pa nyid ni khyab byed yin par bstan pas /
translated: because the cause is not able to be distinguished from the effect. The meaning is that the cause exists.

original: de med na ste rgyu yod pas khyab bya 'bras bu med pa yang ldog pa ni /
analyzed: de med na ste rgyu yod pas khyab bya 'bras bu med pa yang ldog pa ni /
translated: Since the absence of the effect is pervaded by the absence of the cause, when the cause is present, the absence of the effect is reversed.ğŸ”½Because the effect is present.

original: 'bras bu yod pa kho na yin pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba sgrub pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'bras bu yod pa kho na yin pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba sgrub pa yin gyi /
translated: The pervasion is established, but not mere existence.

original: yod pa tsam ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni gang dag yod na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yod pa tsam ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni gang dag yod na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is demonstrated by the phrase â€œwhen these are present.â€

original: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te nus pa can dang nus pa can ma yin pa tha mi dad pa la ltos nas gcig tu bsre ba yin la /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te nus pa can dang nus pa can ma yin pa tha mi dad pa la ltos nas gcig tu bsre ba yin la /
translated: This is what is demonstrated: The capable and the incapable are not distinguished, but are mixed together as one.

original: de yod na 'byung ba kho na rgyu rnams gdon mi za bar de dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de yod na 'byung ba kho na rgyu rnams gdon mi za bar de dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang shes par bya'o //
translated: If it exists, then it is certain that the causes that are its sources do not possess it.

original: nus pa can rgyu yin na 'bras bu 'byung ba kho na yin la /
analyzed: nus pa can rgyu yin na 'bras bu 'byung ba kho na yin la /
translated: If something is a cause that possesses potentiality, then it is only the arising of the effect.

original: de med pa'i dus na rgyu yang med pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: de med pa'i dus na rgyu yang med pa kho na yin te /
translated: If it does not exist, then the cause does not exist at that time.

original: de yod kyang mi 'byung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de yod kyang mi 'byung ba'i phyir /
translated: Because even if it exists, it does not arise.

original: de la dbang byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la dbang byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not control it.

original: gang la de la dbang byed pa ma yin pa de thams cad rgyu la khyab pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gang la de la dbang byed pa ma yin pa de thams cad rgyu la khyab pa'i phyir /
translated: Because everything that does not control it is pervaded by the absence of a cause.

original: thug pa med pa'i phyir thal ches pa yin te /
analyzed: thug pa med pa'i phyir thal ches pa yin te /
translated: Because of the infinite regress, it is absurd.

original: 'di rgyu yin gyi 'di ni ma yin no zhes rnam par gnas pas ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di rgyu yin gyi 'di ni ma yin no zhes rnam par gnas pas ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Because it is not the case that it is a cause in this way and not a cause in that way.

original: yang na mthong ba'i rgyu 'di lta bu'i yon tan can yin par dmigs nas /
analyzed: yang na mthong ba'i rgyu 'di lta bu'i yon tan can yin par dmigs nas /
translated: Or, if one observes that this cause has such and such qualities,

original: rgyu gzhan du rtogs pa yin na /
analyzed: rgyu gzhan du rtogs pa yin na /
translated: one understands it as a cause.ğŸ”½If that is so, is the object of investigation like this?

original: de lta na brtag bya de 'di lta bu zhe 'am /
analyzed: de lta na brtag bya de 'di lta bu zhe 'am /
translated: Or is it like that?

original: de bzhin du gzhan du rtogs par byed pa yang yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan du rtogs par byed pa yang yin te /
translated: So too, it is also the case that one understands other things,

original: rgyu mtshan la bye brag med @170b pa de'i phyir thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan la bye brag med @170b pa de'i phyir thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: because there is no difference in the reason. Therefore, there would be an infinite regress.

original: 'on te rtogs par mi byed pa de dag tsam gyis mgu ba yin na /
analyzed: 'on te rtogs par mi byed pa de dag tsam gyis mgu ba yin na /
translated: But if one is satisfied with just that understanding,

original: yongs su mgu yon tan gzhan de dag tsam du 'gro ba can rnams nyid la yang yod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yongs su mgu yon tan gzhan de dag tsam du 'gro ba can rnams nyid la yang yod pa'i phyir /
translated: then one would be satisfied with just that much in others who have that quality.

original: mgu bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mgu bar 'gyur ro //
translated: So why be satisfied with the Buddha?

original: yon tan can gzhan yang rgyu nyid du brtags pa rnams las gzhan du rtogs pa nyid kyis sar par de'i gnas pa na rgyu nyid kyi rnam par gnas pa yin la /
analyzed: yon tan can gzhan yang rgyu nyid du brtags pa rnams las gzhan du rtogs pa nyid kyis sar par de'i gnas pa na rgyu nyid kyi rnam par gnas pa yin la /
translated: Also, the other qualities that are imagined to be causes are understood to be different from the Buddha, but they are not established as causes in the same way that he is.

original: de ma yin pa ni thug pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: de ma yin pa ni thug pa med pa yin no //
translated: If they were, there would be an infinite regress.

original: mthong ba rnams kyi rgyu rnams kyi de nyid kyi thug pa med pa dang / mthong ba'i nyams pa dang ma mthong ba'i rtog pa rnams yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba rnams kyi rgyu rnams kyi de nyid kyi thug pa med pa dang / mthong ba'i nyams pa dang ma mthong ba'i rtog pa rnams yin no //
translated: The infinite regress of causes would apply to those who see and those who do not see.

original: yang na brtags pa bzhin du 'am rtogs bzhin pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: yang na brtags pa bzhin du 'am rtogs bzhin pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: Or else, the consequence would be that the Buddha would be like those who imagine or those who understand.

original: brtags pa dang brtag bya thams cad kyi rgyu rnams med pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: brtags pa dang brtag bya thams cad kyi rgyu rnams med pa kho na yin no //
translated: All causes of the imagined and the objects of imagination are simply nonexistent.

original: de'i phyir dngos po rnams rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po rnams rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, things would be without causes.

original: de dag las gzhan pa'i rtogs pa yin na yang rigs pa mtshungs pa nyid kyis brtags pa dang / rtogs bzhin pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ba la thug pa med pas rgyu rnams dang de'i 'bras bu thams cad las sar pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: de dag las gzhan pa'i rtogs pa yin na yang rigs pa mtshungs pa nyid kyis brtags pa dang / rtogs bzhin pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ba la thug pa med pas rgyu rnams dang de'i 'bras bu thams cad las sar pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: If they were different from those, the same reasoning would apply, and the consequence would be that the imagined and the objects of imagination would be without causes, and the consequence would be that all causes and their effects would be without causes.

original: rtag par nam mkha' la sogs pa bzhin du gnas par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: rtag par nam mkha' la sogs pa bzhin du gnas par 'gyur gyi /
translated: They would be permanent, like space, etc.

original: 'jig pa dang skye ba dag tu mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'jig pa dang skye ba dag tu mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: They would not be destroyed and would not be produced.

original: rtag tu yod pa 'am med pa'am rgyu med par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rigs pa ni /
analyzed: rtag tu yod pa 'am med pa'am rgyu med par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rigs pa ni /
translated: The reasoning that they would be permanent, nonexistent, or without causes, etc.,

original: 'di la mtshon byed yin par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la mtshon byed yin par bya'o //
translated: should be understood as illustrated by this example.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa yang 'bras bu med pa'i dus na med pa'i ngo bo'i rgyu nyid ni de'i dus na yod pa rtag pa'i ngo bo 'gal ba yin par bstan to //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa yang 'bras bu med pa'i dus na med pa'i ngo bo'i rgyu nyid ni de'i dus na yod pa rtag pa'i ngo bo 'gal ba yin par bstan to //
translated: And the fact that it is present when the effect is present and absent when the effect is absent shows that the cause, which is the entity that is absent when the effect is absent, is incompatible with the permanent entity that is present when the effect is absent.

original: sa gzhi la 'di ni mthong la 'di myu gu la sogs pa'i rgyu ma yin pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: sa gzhi la 'di ni mthong la 'di myu gu la sogs pa'i rgyu ma yin pa yang ma yin te /
translated: The ground is not seen to be the cause of the sprout, etc.

original: de ltar rtogs pa'i rtag tu gnas pa ni 'bras bu med pa'i dus na yang yod do snyam du sems pa la /ğŸ”½myu gu bskyed las la sogs //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs pa'i rtag tu gnas pa ni 'bras bu med pa'i dus na yang yod do snyam du sems pa la / myu gu bskyed las la sogs //
translated: But if you think that the permanent entity that is perceived in this way exists even when the effect is absent,

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: then the verse states,ğŸ”½â€œThe ground is not the cause of the sprout, etc.â€

original: yongs su gyur pa'i sa gzhi ni myu gu la sogs pa'i rgyu yin gyis tsam ni ma yin la /
analyzed: yongs su gyur pa'i sa gzhi ni myu gu la sogs pa'i rgyu yin gyis tsam ni ma yin la /
translated: The ground that has undergone transformation is the cause of the sprout, etc., not the ground alone.

original: yongs su gyur pa yang 'bras bu med pa'i dus na med pa yin no //
analyzed: yongs su gyur pa yang 'bras bu med pa'i dus na med pa yin no //
translated: And the ground that has undergone transformation does not exist when the effect is absent.

original: de lta bu yod na 'bras bu med par 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: de lta bu yod na 'bras bu med par 'gal ba yin te /
translated: If it did exist in that way, it would be incompatible for the effect to be absent.

original: de'i khyad par yod na 'bras bu'i khyad par mthong ba'i phyir yongs su gyur par grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i khyad par yod na 'bras bu'i khyad par mthong ba'i phyir yongs su gyur par grub pa yin no //
translated: And if it had that particular transformation, it would be perceived to have a particular effect. Thus the transformation is established.

original: yang na 'bras bu'i rang bzhin rgyur byas pa'i @171a * //
analyzed: yang na 'bras bu'i rang bzhin rgyur byas pa'i @171a * //
translated: Or, the cause is understood to be the cause of some particular effect because the nature of the effect is based on the cause.

original: khyad par gyis 'ga' zhig gi rgyu nyid du rtogs pa yin gyi ri la sogs pa'i khyad par 'ga' yang las kyis byas pa'i 'bras bu'i nges pa la sogs pa ma gtogs pa dbang phyug gis byas pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni mi rigs teğŸ”½/ ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par gyis 'ga' zhig gi rgyu nyid du rtogs pa yin gyi ri la sogs pa'i khyad par 'ga' yang las kyis byas pa'i 'bras bu'i nges pa la sogs pa ma gtogs pa dbang phyug gis byas pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni mi rigs te / ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But it is illogical to say that the particularities of mountains, etc. are not created by God, but are created by the effects of karma, because that is not certain.

original: 'bras bu la khyad par rag las pa kho na yin pa'i phyir rgyu nyid mthong ba ma yin la /
analyzed: 'bras bu la khyad par rag las pa kho na yin pa'i phyir rgyu nyid mthong ba ma yin la /
translated: Because the cause is not seen to be dependent on the particularity of the effect,

original: gang gi phyir sa gzhi la myu gu la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i bye brag 'ga' yang rag las par mthong ba ma yin zhing /
analyzed: gang gi phyir sa gzhi la myu gu la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i bye brag 'ga' yang rag las par mthong ba ma yin zhing /
translated: because the particularity of the effect, such as a sprout, is not seen to be dependent on the ground, etc.

original: de rgyu ma yin pa yang ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: de rgyu ma yin pa yang ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: and because that is not its cause.

original: 'bras bu thams cad la rgyus byas pa'i khyad par thams cad mthong ba la /
analyzed: 'bras bu thams cad la rgyus byas pa'i khyad par thams cad mthong ba la /
translated: When all the particularities created by the cause in all effects are seen,ğŸ”½the ground, etc.

original: myu gu bskyed la sa la sogs //
analyzed: myu gu bskyed la sa la sogs //
translated: are seen to be the cause of the sprout,

original: rang bzhin yongs su gyur nas ni //
analyzed: rang bzhin yongs su gyur nas ni //
translated: having transformed their nature.

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is the meaning.

original: 'bras bu la yod pa'i khyad par la rag las pa kho na yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'bras bu la yod pa'i khyad par la rag las pa kho na yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is only dependent on the special features of the effect.

original: 'di ci las shes she na /
analyzed: 'di ci las shes she na /
translated: From what is this known?

original: de'i gshol la sogs pas byas pa'i dbyibs yin na /ğŸ”½de'i khyad par te 'bras bu'i khyad par mthong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i gshol la sogs pas byas pa'i dbyibs yin na / de'i khyad par te 'bras bu'i khyad par mthong ba'i phyir /
translated: If the shape is made by his plow, etc.,ğŸ”½then the special features of the effect are seen.

original: dbang phyug gi khyad par gyis khyad par du snang ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang phyug gi khyad par gyis khyad par du snang ba ni ma yin te /
translated: The special features of the effect are not seen due to the special features of God,

original: dmigs bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: dmigs bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: because they are not observed.

original: de'i khyad par la rag las bas dbang phyug rgyu nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i khyad par la rag las bas dbang phyug rgyu nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that because it is dependent on the special features of the effect, God is not the cause.

original: 'dis ni sman du ma las byung ba'i 'bras bu la rgyus byas pa'i khyad par mtshon pa bsal ba yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni sman du ma las byung ba'i 'bras bu la rgyus byas pa'i khyad par mtshon pa bsal ba yin te /
translated: This refutes the idea that the special features of the effect arising from many medicines are made by the cause.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa ngag gi rgyu'i bye brag gis de'i khyad par nye bar mtshon pa ni bya bla ba nyid kyi phyir khyad par rjes su mtshon pa ma yin yang /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa ngag gi rgyu'i bye brag gis de'i khyad par nye bar mtshon pa ni bya bla ba nyid kyi phyir khyad par rjes su mtshon pa ma yin yang /
translated: The special features of the effect are indicated by the particularities of the cause through concomitance and reverse concomitance. The special features are not indicated by the cause itself,ğŸ”½because the cause is not the effect.

original: rgyu nyid yin na srid pa ni rtsa ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu nyid yin na srid pa ni rtsa ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is a cause, existence is without a root.

original: de bzhin du 'bras bu med pa'i dus na med pa ni rgyu yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'bras bu med pa'i dus na med pa ni rgyu yin la /
translated: Similarly, when there is no effect, the cause does not exist.ğŸ”½This is known only through its effect.

original: de nyid khyad par kho nas shes pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di la phyi rol bstan nas nang gi dpe bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid khyad par kho nas shes pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di la phyi rol bstan nas nang gi dpe bstan pa ni /
translated: Having taught the external example, the internal example is taught:

original: gal te ji ltar yul dbang po //ğŸ”½zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gal te ji ltar yul dbang po // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If, like the sense faculties,ğŸ”½the effect does not exist when the cause exists,

original: 'bras bu med pa'i dus na mi 'byung ba 'am 'bras bu la yod pa ma yin na /ğŸ”½'bras bu tsam mthong ba las dbang po la sogs pa rgyu yin la /
analyzed: 'bras bu med pa'i dus na mi 'byung ba 'am 'bras bu la yod pa ma yin na / 'bras bu tsam mthong ba las dbang po la sogs pa rgyu yin la /
translated: and if the effect does not exist in the cause,ğŸ”½then the cause is the sense faculties, etc.,

original: de ltar dbang phyug la sogs pa go bya yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar dbang phyug la sogs pa go bya yin no zhe na /
translated: and the effect is God, etc.

original: lan ni min zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni min zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is â€œNo!â€

original: ci las shes na /
analyzed: ci las shes na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de la yang ste dbang po la sogs pa'i rgyu 'am 'bras bu rnam shes la khyad par yod pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: de la yang ste dbang po la sogs pa'i rgyu 'am 'bras bu rnam shes la khyad par yod pa kho na yin no //
translated: The cause, the sense faculties, etc., or the effect, consciousness, is not different.

original: khyad par de nyid lhan cig brjod pas bstan pa ni /
analyzed: khyad par de nyid lhan cig brjod pas bstan pa ni /
translated: That difference is taught through the expression â€œonly.â€

original: @171b de la dbang po la sogs pa rnams so sor nus pa med pa rnams tshogs kyang /
analyzed: @171b de la dbang po la sogs pa rnams so sor nus pa med pa rnams tshogs kyang /
translated: The collection of the eye, etc., which are individually without power,

original: nus pa med kyang 'gyur la /
analyzed: nus pa med kyang 'gyur la /
translated: is also without power.

original: de'i tshe yang de'i rang gi ngo bo mi dor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang de'i rang gi ngo bo mi dor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And at that time, it does not abandon its own nature.

original: sdod par mi byed pa rnams kyi yang nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyu rnams kyis bya ba med par 'dug pa nyams pa rnams kho nar nye bar 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sdod par mi byed pa rnams kyi yang nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyu rnams kyis bya ba med par 'dug pa nyams pa rnams kho nar nye bar 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: And for those that do not remain, the causes of their approach are not without activity, because they approach only when their remaining is impaired.

original: rgyun gyi khyad par yin la /
analyzed: rgyun gyi khyad par yin la /
translated: The difference in the continuum is the cause.

original: gzhan rnams kyi ni phan tshun gyis yin zhes bya ba ni rnam par dbye ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan rnams kyi ni phan tshun gyis yin zhes bya ba ni rnam par dbye ba'o //
translated: The difference in the other is mutual. This is the analysis.

original: khyad par de yang gal te khyad par gzhan gyis ma yin na ni thug pa med pas rgyu ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: khyad par de yang gal te khyad par gzhan gyis ma yin na ni thug pa med pas rgyu ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: And if that difference is not by another difference, then it is not a cause because of the infinite regress.

original: gal te gzhan du yin na 'bras bu nyid ci ste mi byed /
analyzed: gal te gzhan du yin na 'bras bu nyid ci ste mi byed /
translated: If it is by another, why does it not produce the effect?

original: smras pa nye bar 'gro ba'i khyad par gyi khyad par yin na /
analyzed: smras pa nye bar 'gro ba'i khyad par gyi khyad par yin na /
translated: It is said that the difference is the difference in the approach.

original: lhan cig byed pa po nyid yin gyi khyad par gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa po nyid yin gyi khyad par gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: It is the co-agent, not another difference.

original: 'bras bu la ni khyad par gyis de ltar ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu la ni khyad par gyis de ltar ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the effect is not seen to be different in the result.

original: byed pa po nyid kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: byed pa po nyid kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The agent itself is also twofold:

original: khyad par dang / lhan cig pa dag go //
analyzed: khyad par dang / lhan cig pa dag go //
translated: the special and the simultaneous.

original: rgyun gyi khyad par med pa ni lhan cig byed pa po tsam khas len pa yin na 'bras bu brjod pa tsam la yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyun gyi khyad par med pa ni lhan cig byed pa po tsam khas len pa yin na 'bras bu brjod pa tsam la yang 'gyur ro //
translated: If the special is not accepted as the simultaneous agent, then it would be the mere statement of the effect.

original: tshogs pa skyon gyis bsgribs pa bsal bar byed pa yin gyi khyad par ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: tshogs pa skyon gyis bsgribs pa bsal bar byed pa yin gyi khyad par ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: The assembly is cleared of faults, but the special is not.

original: de yang de'i tshe kho na yin pa'i phyir ji ltar 'bras bu dus gzhan la yin //
analyzed: de yang de'i tshe kho na yin pa'i phyir ji ltar 'bras bu dus gzhan la yin //
translated: Since that is just at that time, how could the effect be at another time?

original: nus pa yod pa'i phyir skyon yod kyang cis mi byed /
analyzed: nus pa yod pa'i phyir skyon yod kyang cis mi byed /
translated: Because of the potential, why wouldnâ€™t it be done even with faults?

original: de'i phyir byed pa po nyid ma yin pa gzhan gyis bsal ba yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir byed pa po nyid ma yin pa gzhan gyis bsal ba yin la /
translated: Therefore, the agent itself is cleared by another, but not the special.

original: byed pa po nyid kyang de'i tshe kho na mngon par 'byung ba yin pas snga na yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu med pa'i dus na mi 'byung ba'i mi rtag pa rnam gyi khyad par grub pa yin gyi /
analyzed: byed pa po nyid kyang de'i tshe kho na mngon par 'byung ba yin pas snga na yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu med pa'i dus na mi 'byung ba'i mi rtag pa rnam gyi khyad par grub pa yin gyi /
translated: Since the agent itself is manifest at that time, it does not exist prior to that. Therefore, the distinction of impermanence is established, i.e., that it does not exist when the effect does not exist.

original: 'di rtag pa rnams la ni mi srid do //
analyzed: 'di rtag pa rnams la ni mi srid do //
translated: But this is not possible for permanent things.

original: de bzhin du khyad par ni rigs pa'i rtogs bya 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du khyad par ni rigs pa'i rtogs bya 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin te /
translated: Similarly, a distinction is not merely an object of knowledge by reasoning.

original: de lta mod kyi snang ba nyid yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi snang ba nyid yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: However, the master has taught that it is also an appearance.

original: mig dang gzugs kyi khyad par las zhes bya ba'o //ğŸ”½don 'di rnam 'grel las /
analyzed: mig dang gzugs kyi khyad par las zhes bya ba'o // don 'di rnam 'grel las /
translated: From the distinction of eye and form.

original: yongs su gsal ba'i phyir 'grel pa mkhan gyis ma bshad do //
analyzed: yongs su gsal ba'i phyir 'grel pa mkhan gyis ma bshad do //
translated: This meaning is not explained by the commentator because it is well known.

original: 'bras bu'i ngo bo'i khyad par las bzhin du rgyu nyid ces shes par bya ba yin /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i ngo bo'i khyad par las bzhin du rgyu nyid ces shes par bya ba yin /
translated: It should be understood that the cause itself is like the distinction of the nature of the effect.

original: ma byas pa de'i bye brag kyang de nyid shes pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni mi gsal ba'i phyir 'di 'chad par byed pa ni /
analyzed: ma byas pa de'i bye brag kyang de nyid shes pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni mi gsal ba'i phyir 'di 'chad par byed pa ni /
translated: The distinction of that which is not produced is also not a reason for knowing that. Because it is not clear, this is explained.

original: mig la sogs pa rnams ni 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa rnams ni 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: The eyes, etc. are the nature of the effect, etc.

original: khyad par @172a * //
analyzed: khyad par @172a * //
translated: The difference is

original: nyid la zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu la yod pa las so //
analyzed: nyid la zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu la yod pa las so //
translated: in the effect.

original: 'bras bu rnam par shes pa ni mig gis gzugs 'dzin par so sor nges pa yin la /
analyzed: 'bras bu rnam par shes pa ni mig gis gzugs 'dzin par so sor nges pa yin la /
translated: The effect, consciousness, is determined to apprehend form by the eye.

original: yul las de rnam pa can du yid la byed pa las rtogs pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yul las de rnam pa can du yid la byed pa las rtogs pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir /
translated: And it is understood to have the aspect of the object because it is mentally attended to as having that aspect.

original: phan tshun rang bzhin mi mthun pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par gyis mtshan nyid mi mthun pa kho na rgyu yin par rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: phan tshun rang bzhin mi mthun pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par gyis mtshan nyid mi mthun pa kho na rgyu yin par rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the cause should be understood to be only different in its characteristics, since the effect is different in its nature, which is not common to anything else.ğŸ”½The difference is in the effect, because the other differences do not produce it.

original: khyad par de gcig skyed par byed pa las khyad par gzhan med pas so sor nus pa med pa rnams kyi rgyun te /
analyzed: khyad par de gcig skyed par byed pa las khyad par gzhan med pas so sor nus pa med pa rnams kyi rgyun te /
translated: The stream of those that are not individually capable is the cause of the effect.

original: 'bras bu'i khyad par ni nges pa can gyi khyad par te /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i khyad par ni nges pa can gyi khyad par te /
translated: The difference in the effect is the definite difference.

original: rgyu nges pa can gyi bskyed bya yin la gzugs 'dzin pa'i so sor nges pa la sogs pa med na rtogs byed ma yin pa'i phyir /ğŸ”½tshogs kyang rgyu ma yin pa zhig tu 'gyur ba zhig na nges pa can gyi rgyu'i bskyed bya nges pa can gyi khyad par rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rtogs bya yang yod pa yin la /ğŸ”½dbang phyug gi bskyed bya'i khyad par ri la sogs pa la ni /
analyzed: rgyu nges pa can gyi bskyed bya yin la gzugs 'dzin pa'i so sor nges pa la sogs pa med na rtogs byed ma yin pa'i phyir / tshogs kyang rgyu ma yin pa zhig tu 'gyur ba zhig na nges pa can gyi rgyu'i bskyed bya nges pa can gyi khyad par rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rtogs bya yang yod pa yin la / dbang phyug gi bskyed bya'i khyad par ri la sogs pa la ni /
translated: If the object were not the effect of the specific cause, then the specific object would not be the object of the specific consciousness.

original: de ltar rtogs par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: If the specific object were not the object of the specific consciousness, then the specific consciousness would not be the apprehender of the specific object.ğŸ”½If the specific consciousness were not the apprehender of the specific object, then the specific consciousness would not be the effect of the specific cause.ğŸ”½If the specific consciousness were not the effect of the specific cause, then the specific cause would not be the cause of the specific consciousness.ğŸ”½If the specific cause were not the cause of the specific consciousness, then the specific consciousness would not be the effect of the specific cause.ğŸ”½If the specific consciousness were not the effect of the specific cause, then the specific cause would not be the cause of the specific consciousness.ğŸ”½If the specific cause were not the cause of the specific consciousness, then the specific consciousness would not be the effect of the specific cause.

original: khyad par skyed par byed pa'i sgo kho na nas shes pa nyid dbang po la sogs pa rnams kyi bskyed bya yin gyi /ğŸ”½de tsam mam /ğŸ”½de'i khyad par gyi khyad par can nyid de'i rgyu nyid du go bar byed pa gzhan ni dbang po la sogs pa nyid la yod par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: khyad par skyed par byed pa'i sgo kho na nas shes pa nyid dbang po la sogs pa rnams kyi bskyed bya yin gyi / de tsam mam / de'i khyad par gyi khyad par can nyid de'i rgyu nyid du go bar byed pa gzhan ni dbang po la sogs pa nyid la yod par bstan pa ni /
translated: If the specific consciousness were not the effect of the specific cause, then the specific cause would not be the cause of the specific consciousness.ğŸ”½If the specific cause were not the cause of the specific consciousness, then the specific consciousness would not be the effect of the specific cause.ğŸ”½If the specific consciousness were not the effect of the specific cause, then the specific cause would not be the cause of the specific consciousness.ğŸ”½If the specific cause were not the cause of the specific consciousness, then the specific consciousness would not be the effect of the specific cause.ğŸ”½If the specific consciousness were not the effect of the specific cause, then the specific cause would not be the cause of the specific consciousness.ğŸ”½If the specific cause were not the cause of the specific consciousness, then the specific consciousness would not be the effect of the specific cause.ğŸ”½If the specific consciousness were not the effect of the specific cause, then the specific cause would not be the cause of the specific consciousness.ğŸ”½If the specific cause were not the cause of the specific consciousness, then the specific consciousness would not be the effect of the specific cause.

original: mig dang gzugs kyi khyad par las //ğŸ”½zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: mig dang gzugs kyi khyad par las //ğŸ”½zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If the specific consciousness were not the effect of the specific cause, then the specific cause would not be the cause of the specific consciousness.ğŸ”½If the specific cause were not the cause of the specific consciousness, then the specific consciousness would not be the effect of the specific cause

original: 'di la rnam 'grel du yongs su mi gsal ba yin pa'i dgongs pas 'grel pa mdzad pa'i yongs su gyur pa'i khyad par nyid kyis /
analyzed: 'di la rnam 'grel du yongs su mi gsal ba yin pa'i dgongs pas 'grel pa mdzad pa'i yongs su gyur pa'i khyad par nyid kyis /
translated: In this regard, the Commentary on Valid Knowledge explains that the intention is that it is not completely clear.

original: rgyu skyed par byed pa yin pa de'i phyir 'bras bu mi 'byung ba'i dus na med pa yin no zhes bya ba de ltar rgyu nyid yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya bar /
analyzed: rgyu skyed par byed pa yin pa de'i phyir 'bras bu mi 'byung ba'i dus na med pa yin no zhes bya ba de ltar rgyu nyid yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya bar /
translated: Because it is the cause that generates the effect, therefore, when the effect does not arise, it does not exist. Thus it is the cause, not something else.

original: 'o na te mig phye ba na zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'o na te mig phye ba na zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed pa yin no //
translated: But if one says, When the eye is open, and so on, it is explained.

original: yang na gal te ji ltar yul dbang po zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i khyad par rgyu nyid du go bar byed par bstan pa ste /
analyzed: yang na gal te ji ltar yul dbang po zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i khyad par rgyu nyid du go bar byed par bstan pa ste /
translated: Or, if one says, How is it that the object and sense faculty are taught to be understood as the cause of the effect?

original: mig dang gzugs kyi khyad par las //
analyzed: mig dang gzugs kyi khyad par las //
translated: From the special eye and form,

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: is said.

original: rgyu ni 'bras bu med pa'i dus na med pa sgrub pa'i don du yin gyi /
analyzed: rgyu ni 'bras bu med pa'i dus na med pa sgrub pa'i don du yin gyi /
translated: The cause is established as not existing when the effect does not exist.

original: 'di gnyis kyang rgyu nyid yin pa'i rgyu mtshan dbang phyug la med do zhes bya bar nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'di gnyis kyang rgyu nyid yin pa'i rgyu mtshan dbang phyug la med do zhes bya bar nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa ni /
translated: The summary that shows that these two reasons are not causes of God is stated in the following:

original: de'i phyir so sor zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir so sor zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, individually,

original: so sor nus pa med pa rnams @172b la ste /
analyzed: so sor nus pa med pa rnams @172b la ste /
translated: with regard to those that are individually incapable,

original: khyad par gzhan gyi nus pa med pa rnams la 'ang 'bras bu la yang ste /
analyzed: khyad par gzhan gyi nus pa med pa rnams la 'ang 'bras bu la yang ste /
translated: even with regard to the effect,

original: so sor nus pa med pa rnams la /
analyzed: so sor nus pa med pa rnams la /
translated: with regard to those that are individually incapable,

original: gang dag la yod 'gyur na ste 'bras bu'i yon tan gyi khyad par yod na 'am /
analyzed: gang dag la yod 'gyur na ste 'bras bu'i yon tan gyi khyad par yod na 'am /
translated: if they had the qualities of the effect,

original: gang dag la ste yul la yang rung yod par 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: gang dag la ste yul la yang rung yod par 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: if they had the object,

original: tshogs pa ni de dag kho na rgyu nyid du tshad mas grub pa yin gyi /
analyzed: tshogs pa ni de dag kho na rgyu nyid du tshad mas grub pa yin gyi /
translated: then only those would be established by valid knowledge as the causes.

original: dbang phyug la sogs pa rnams ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang phyug la sogs pa rnams ni ma yin te /
translated: But God and so on are not.

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir 'bras bu med pa'i dus na rang la yod pa'i khyad par med pas /
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir 'bras bu med pa'i dus na rang la yod pa'i khyad par med pas /
translated: Because they are not different, because when the effect does not exist, they do not have a difference that they have by themselves,

original: 'bras bu la yod pa'i khyad par med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'bras bu la yod pa'i khyad par med pa'i phyir te /
translated: because they do not have a difference that they have with regard to the effect.

original: dpe gnyis kyang yul mang po nyid bstan pas /
analyzed: dpe gnyis kyang yul mang po nyid bstan pas /
translated: The two examples also teach the many objects.

original: bstan par bya ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: bstan par bya ba'i don du'o //
translated: Therefore, it is for the sake of what is to be taught.

original: skad cig ma nyid la sogs par yang dag par gsungs pas kyang /
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid la sogs par yang dag par gsungs pas kyang /
translated: Also, by correctly teaching momentariness and so on,

original: rtogs bzhin pa'i yang dag pa gzigs pa po ni //
analyzed: rtogs bzhin pa'i yang dag pa gzigs pa po ni //
translated: the one who sees the correct nature as it is

original: skad cig pa sna tshogs pa tsam gyi ngo bo tsam mam /
analyzed: skad cig pa sna tshogs pa tsam gyi ngo bo tsam mam /
translated: is not just the mere essence of a mere variety of moments,

original: 'dod chags la sogs pas so sor rig pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pas so sor rig pa ma yin nam /
translated: or is he individually cognized by attachment and so on?

original: des gsungs pa'i gnyen po ni de'i rig pa ma yin pas de'i gnyen po'i nus pa mi shes pas bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des gsungs pa'i gnyen po ni de'i rig pa ma yin pas de'i gnyen po'i nus pa mi shes pas bstan par 'gyur te /

original: de yang de bzhin du 'dod chags dang ldan pa yin la /
analyzed: de yang de bzhin du 'dod chags dang ldan pa yin la /
translated: Moreover, he would be just like one with attachment.

original: las dang 'bras bu shes pa'i stobs ma skyes pas snying rje dang ldan pa yin yang /
analyzed: las dang 'bras bu shes pa'i stobs ma skyes pas snying rje dang ldan pa yin yang /
translated: And although he has compassion, since the power of knowing karma and its result has not arisen,

original: gang gis 'di ni byang grol gyi don yin //
analyzed: gang gis 'di ni byang grol gyi don yin //
translated: by what is this the meaning of liberation?

original: 'di ni mtho ris kyi don yin zhes shes par 'gyur shes pa'i dus na ni bya ba'i rang gi ngo bo med pa'i phyir mngon sum gyis kyang de rig pa ma yin te /ğŸ”½nye ba tsam 'dzin pa can gyi mngon sum ni de lta bu ma yin pa la tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni mtho ris kyi don yin zhes shes par 'gyur shes pa'i dus na ni bya ba'i rang gi ngo bo med pa'i phyir mngon sum gyis kyang de rig pa ma yin te / nye ba tsam 'dzin pa can gyi mngon sum ni de lta bu ma yin pa la tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: When one knows that this is the purpose of heaven, then the nature of the action is not present, and therefore it is not known by perception.

original: 'bras bu'i dus na ni de shes pa med pa yin la de'i tshe nas de 'das pa yin pas 'di las 'di yin no zhes shes pa ni mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i dus na ni de shes pa med pa yin la de'i tshe nas de 'das pa yin pas 'di las 'di yin no zhes shes pa ni mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Nor is it a valid cognition that apprehends mere proximity, because at the time of the result, that knowledge does not exist. At that time, it has already passed, so the knowledge that this is from that is not perception.

original: 'bras bu las rgyu tsam gyi yul la rjes su dpog pa yang khyad par ram bsod nams sam cig shos kyang yin zhes mi shes te /
analyzed: 'bras bu las rgyu tsam gyi yul la rjes su dpog pa yang khyad par ram bsod nams sam cig shos kyang yin zhes mi shes te /
translated: Nor is it inference from the result to the mere object of the cause, because it is not known whether it is a particular, merit, or something else.

original: de lta bu'i nges pa ni 'jug pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bu'i nges pa ni 'jug pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because such certainty is the cause of engagement.

original: shes gang 'jug pa'i yan lag yin //
analyzed: shes gang 'jug pa'i yan lag yin //
translated: The knowledge that is a part of engagement

original: de yi rtsa ba brtag bya la /ğŸ”½ci yang yod pa'i shes pa ni //
analyzed: de yi rtsa ba brtag bya la / ci yang yod pa'i shes pa ni //
translated: should be examined as its root.ğŸ”½What need do people have

analyzed: mi rnams la ni ci zhig dgos //

original: rtsa ba de yang ji skad bstan pa'i rim pas rig byed ma yin la /
analyzed: rtsa ba de yang ji skad bstan pa'i rim pas rig byed ma yin la /
translated: And that root is nonindicative form, as has been explained.

original: rtag pa nyid 'ga' zhig ni dbang phyug la sogs pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rtag pa nyid 'ga' zhig ni dbang phyug la sogs pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Some say: The root is not a permanent entity such as ÄªÅ›vara.

original: bsgom pa las byung ba'i mngon sum rtsa ba yin zhes bya bar @173a * //
analyzed: bsgom pa las byung ba'i mngon sum rtsa ba yin zhes bya bar @173a * //
translated: It is the direct perception derived from meditation.

original: yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: yang mi rigs te /
translated: But that is illogical.

original: mthong ba med na bsgom pa mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba med na bsgom pa mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if one does not see, it is illogical to meditate.

original: 'ga' zhig tu dngos po mthong ba na bsgom pas gzhan du snang bar 'gyur ba yin no //ğŸ”½'dod pa dang mya ngan dang 'jigs pa dang myos pa dang rmi lam la sogs pas nye bar bslad pa rnams ni yang dag pa ma yin yang /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig tu dngos po mthong ba na bsgom pas gzhan du snang bar 'gyur ba yin no // 'dod pa dang mya ngan dang 'jigs pa dang myos pa dang rmi lam la sogs pas nye bar bslad pa rnams ni yang dag pa ma yin yang /
translated: When one sees an object in one place, through meditation it appears elsewhere.

original: mdun na gnas pa bzhin du mthong ba yin no zhe na yang /
analyzed: mdun na gnas pa bzhin du mthong ba yin no zhe na yang /
translated: Some say: Those who are affected by desire, sorrow, fear, intoxication, dreams and so on see things as if they are present before them, though they are not real.ğŸ”½If the object is not real, how can it be valid knowledge?

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yul can ji ltar tshad ma yin yang dag pa'i yul can ni tshad ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yul can ji ltar tshad ma yin yang dag pa'i yul can ni tshad ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If the object is real, it is valid knowledge.

original: de lta na de rang gi ngo bos mthong ba yin na bsgom byar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na de rang gi ngo bos mthong ba yin na bsgom byar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it sees by its own nature, it becomes an object of meditation.

original: thos pa yin no zhe na /ğŸ”½thos pa ni tshul gsum pa'i rtags mtshon par byed pa yin gyi rang dbang du yang ma yin la chos la sogs pa la yang /
analyzed: thos pa yin no zhe na / thos pa ni tshul gsum pa'i rtags mtshon par byed pa yin gyi rang dbang du yang ma yin la chos la sogs pa la yang /
translated: If you say that it is heard,ğŸ”½then hearing is a sign that indicates the three modes, but it is not independent.

original: de lta bu'i rtags rig pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i rtags rig pa ma yin te /
translated: And in regard to phenomena and so on, such a sign is not known,

original: dbang po 'das pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po 'das pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is beyond the senses.

original: bde ba la sogs pa'am 'gro ba sna tshogs pa nyid kyang las las byung ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa'am 'gro ba sna tshogs pa nyid kyang las las byung ba ma yin nam /
translated: And is the variety of beings not also produced from karma?

original: las kyang rjes su sgrub par byed na 'bras bu ster ba yin gyi /
analyzed: las kyang rjes su sgrub par byed na 'bras bu ster ba yin gyi /

original: mi shes na rjes su sgrub par byed na yang med do //
analyzed: mi shes na rjes su sgrub par byed na yang med do //
translated: But if it is not known, then even if it is accomplished, it does not exist.

original: las bzhin du shes pa yang yod pa nyid du nges par rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: las bzhin du shes pa yang yod pa nyid du nges par rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Just as with karma, it is ascertained that knowledge exists.

original: de las yang bsgoms pa las byung ba med de /
analyzed: de las yang bsgoms pa las byung ba med de /
translated: But it is not produced from meditation,

original: da ltar bzhin du mngon sum la sogs de rtogs pa med pas de las bsgoms pa mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: da ltar bzhin du mngon sum la sogs de rtogs pa med pas de las bsgoms pa mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because, like the present, it is not cognized by perception and so on. Therefore it is illogical that it is produced from meditation.

original: nyams su myong ba dran pa la goms pas kyang de shes pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba dran pa la goms pas kyang de shes pa ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it known through the familiarization of the memory of experience.

original: de bzhin du nyams su myong ba med na bsgoms pa las kyang de dran pa med pa'i phyir 'jig rten pha rol ni 'jig rten 'di bzhin du nyams su myong ba yin na /
analyzed: de bzhin du nyams su myong ba med na bsgoms pa las kyang de dran pa med pa'i phyir 'jig rten pha rol ni 'jig rten 'di bzhin du nyams su myong ba yin na /
translated: Therefore, the other world is like this world, in that it is experienced.

original: dran pa goms pa las dran par 'gyur ba yin gyi las dang 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dran pa goms pa las dran par 'gyur ba yin gyi las dang 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Memory arises from the cultivation of memory, not from the connection between action and result.ğŸ”½â€œThe result of the experience of action in a former existence is in this one.â€

original: srid pa snga ma la las nyams su myong ba'i 'bras bu 'di la zhes bya ba 'jig rten gnyi ga rig pa po de dag gi de nyid rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis ma rig pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: srid pa snga ma la las nyams su myong ba'i 'bras bu 'di la zhes bya ba 'jig rten gnyi ga rig pa po de dag gi de nyid rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis ma rig pa ma yin nam /

analyzed: du ba 'am me ni rang gi ngo bos rig pa yin na rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pas gtan tshigs la sogs pa nyid mi rig pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If smoke and fire are known by their intrinsic reality, then positive and negative concomitance are not unknown in the case of the reason.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, they are not.

original: de'i tshe yang shes pa de'i thabs med pas ma shes pa la rjes su bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang shes pa de'i thabs med pas ma shes pa la rjes su bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because at that time, there is no means of knowing that knowledge, and so there is no establishment of the unknown through positive and negative concomitance.

original: 'jig rten ni shes pa la rjes su bsgrub pa yin te /
analyzed: 'jig rten ni shes pa la rjes su bsgrub pa yin te /
translated: The world is established in consciousness.

original: 'di ni bsod @173b nams so //
analyzed: 'di ni bsod @173b nams so //

original: 'di ni sdig pa'o zhes pa'i tshig gnyes po de la /
analyzed: 'di ni sdig pa'o zhes pa'i tshig gnyes po de la /
translated: The words of this verse are

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /

analyzed: mngon sum la sogs pa ma gtogs par 'jig rten tshad ma nyid ma yin pa'i phyir /

analyzed: ces bya ba ste /

analyzed: gang gi phyir 'jig rten yang de nyid la rtsa bar 'dod pa yin te /

analyzed: da ltar thams cad shes pa nyid brtag pa la don med do //

analyzed: snga na med pa'i rgol ba dang lan bzhin du kun tu snang bar ni mi rigs so //
translated: If the relation of action to its effect were due to the experience of the cultivation of memory, then it would be like a previously nonexistent argument and answer, and it would not be reasonable for it to appear everywhere.

analyzed: rgol ba dang lan dag gis bstan bcos kyi don don dang 'brel bas so sor snang ba yin la /

original: 'bras bu 'gro ba sna tshogs pa nyid ni rgyu las snang tshogs pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa yin no zhes na /
analyzed: 'bras bu 'gro ba sna tshogs pa nyid ni rgyu las snang tshogs pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa yin no zhes na /

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so.

analyzed: gal te sbyor byed ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yang mchod rten la phyag bya ba la sogs pa'i ngag bden pa'i sgo nas thams cad shes pa nyid sgrub par byed pa yin na de lta na sangs rgyas thams cad shes pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i

original: zhes bya ba la the tshom za ba yin no //

original: zhes bya ba ni bye brag ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bye brag ste /

original: bdag gis smras pa mngon sum yin /
analyzed: bdag gis smras pa mngon sum yin /

analyzed: de'i yod pa nyid du 'dod pa sgrub par byed ces pa ni / mngon @177a * //

original: rtsa ba bcad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtsa ba bcad pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: rtsa ba ma bcad pa'i dran pa ni tshad mar nye bar 'jog par byed pas tshad mar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: 'di ni thams cad shes pa'i dran pa ni sh'akya'i dge slong kha cig la grags pa yin te /

original: yongs su bzung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba'i phyir /
translated: Because it is accepted.

original: rtsa ba'i rtog pa la nus pa can ma yin no //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i rtog pa la nus pa can ma yin no //

original: drang srong brgyad po la sogs pa rnams kyi khyad par yin te /
analyzed: drang srong brgyad po la sogs pa rnams kyi khyad par yin te /

original: ma lus pa khyed kyi dran pa las bzlog pas rtogs pa'i phyir yin gyi /
analyzed: ma lus pa khyed kyi dran pa las bzlog pas rtogs pa'i phyir yin gyi /

original: dran pa rnam par ma bcad pa las thams cad shes par rtogs pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: dran pa rnam par ma bcad pa las thams cad shes par rtogs pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not the realization of all knowledge from the non-cessation of memory.

original: rtsa ba rnam par bcad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtsa ba rnam par bcad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the root has been cut.

original: 'ga' zhig kho nas yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bsam pas zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig kho nas yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bsam pas zhes zer ba ni /
translated: Some say that it is because of the intention to accept only some.

original: phyogs gcig mi slu ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: phyogs gcig mi slu ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is called non-deceptive in one part.

original: re zhig thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin pa zhes bya bas rgyu med par bstan pa nyid lkog tu gyur pa'i don thams cad ni mngon du byed par srid pa ma yin te zhes bya bas gsal bar byed pa yin te /

translated: The statement for a while, not omniscience indicates the reason. The statement it is not possible to manifest all hidden objects clarifies that.

original: kun shes bya ba'i rnam shes ni //
analyzed: kun shes bya ba'i rnam shes ni //
translated: The consciousness that knows all

original: de ye shes bya med bar //
analyzed: de ye shes bya med bar //
translated: does not have an object of knowledge.

original: gang las zhes bya ba la sogs pas shes pa po med pa dang / thams cad shes pa med par yang rigs par tshad mas gsal bar byed pa yin te sangs rgyas kyi shes pa'i shes bya skad cig ma dang stong pa dang bdag med pa nyid dang chos dang cho ma yin pa la sogs pa'i yul rnam par rtog pa dang
analyzed: gang las zhes bya ba la sogs pas shes pa po med pa dang / thams cad shes pa med par yang rigs par tshad mas gsal bar byed pa yin te sangs rgyas kyi shes pa'i shes bya skad cig ma dang stong pa dang bdag med pa nyid dang chos dang cho ma yin pa la sogs pa'i yul rnam par rtog pa dang
translated: The statement from that and so on clarifies by means of valid knowledge that it is logical that there is no knower and no knower of all. The object of knowledge of the consciousness of a buddha is momentary, empty, selfless, phenomena, non-phenomena, and so on.

original: bral bas 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i skyes bu rnams kyis thams cad shes par bzung ba med pa'i phyir tshad ma thams cad med pas na med par rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: bral bas 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i skyes bu rnams kyis thams cad shes par bzung ba med pa'i phyir tshad ma thams cad med pas na med par rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Because of the absence of the knower of all, all valid cognitions are absent, and so one realizes that it does not exist.

original: de'i gtan tshigs kyi don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i gtan tshigs kyi don ni 'di yin te /

original: zhes bya ba ni mi rigs te /

analyzed: zhes bya ba ste shes pa dang ldan pa tshol bar byed pa nan tan du byed pa'i yan lag kho na yin pa ni gal te nan tan du bya ba de'i shes pa dang ldan pa yod na yin te rang gi bzhin du gzhan la shes pa yod
translated: If one who has knowledge seeks, one has the branch of practice. If one who has the knowledge of the practice exists, then one has knowledge of the teaching, just as one has knowledge of one's own face.
